The food was good, the service was good and the pricing was also good; but I would definitely not say it was great.  The decor was ok. 

My wife and I went, based on the reviews; it is located in a nondescript strip mall, thankfully my wife noticed it. 

We arrived during happy hour. 

We ordered a few items from the happy hour menu and a few off the regular menu.   We also had one of their specialty cocktails. 

The food was good, some better than others. 

We had the calamari, while tasty, it was a little dry and perhaps overcooked. 

We also had some beef items based on the reviews and they were good. 

The veggies were delicious. 

I have been to Korean BBQ before, and I had enjoyed it. For our meal, I think we needed some sauces for the meat dishes.

I love this place! Such a great little restaurant off the strip! Meats are premium cuts, so tender and juicy! Friendly staff with great customer service skills. We got the platter for 2; but could easily feed 3. Would definitely come back here!
Everything was amazing!!! The food is delicious, service is great and the prices are really good! Will defiantly come back!!!
Came here with 5 adults and 1 baby. Got the Las Vegas and Gangnam sets and that was more than enough. Good quality meat. Tables too high. Friendly staff.
Came here on a whim based on the Yelp reviews. Absolutely amazing on all fronts. Tons of food, decent price, and solid service.

Great food and having fun with the know. Ordered the meat lovers special. Everything this high quality that offers you a little bit of everything. The service is friendly and explains what everything is and what order to cook in. Would come back again for sure.
I've had this place bookmarked for a while so I was pretty excited to come. Our favorite dishes were Harami Miso and the Korean Prime Kalbi. Desperately wish they had all you can eat!
Amazing food and service.  Can't wait to come back.  The portions were really big. We definitely over ordered!!!

A good place with great food. Perfect for meat lovers. I especially like the spicy pork there.
The server is also very kind and nice!
Gang am is a plus for our Vegas trip!
My first time ever having korean bbq and it was amazing. Staff is friendly and service is fast and delicious. I'll be coming back.

Great service! Great food and the super clean restaurant. The staff was so attentive to our needs. The food was delicious ! I had had the bimbim bop and it was perfect.  The appetizers were small dishes with different types of kimchi. There was something for everyone's pallet .Will come back and revisit, when my husband and I come back to Vegas.
Went here for team lunch. We ordered a premium combo for 4. It's good and fed 5 of us full.

Very pretty waitress will give you wonderful service.
I highly recommend this restaurant if y'all very hungry and try some korean foods. 
Foods are in good quality and clean as well. 
Go for it if you are on trip in Las Vegas.

Great food + great service = excellent experience. Our server, Fransisco was great and provided wonderful service informing us of the dinner option since we had never tried Korean Bbq before. All employees were very friendly. Would definitely come back in the future if in Las Vegas!

This is my 3rd time here. Food quality is the same, but service is better. We decided to come later tonight, so no line to be seated, no wait for food. Service is lighting fast this time. Plus I just find out that after 10 pm is happy hours, so every dishes are a bit cheaper.

First time at this restaurant and the food is absolutely delicious. Full of flavor and lots of options. The wait staff are all very attentive. Our waiter's name is Joseph and he has been so great and helpful. Great experience and will be back next time I am in town!!

This restaurant sure is a fun one! The idea of cooking your own food at your table is super cool. 
Your meal is served with 7 complimentary side dishes. The price of the entrees is very reasonable for the amount of food that is given. 
Fun atmosphere. 
There's a screen with music videos played on it, which is cool!

Wow great service and food.

We got the premium and shared it with three people and it was pretty filling.

I really enjoyed the poki tuna and Kobe beef. 

Free dessert if you write a review

I'm a believer. This place was just perfect. Incredible meats, great appetizers, and a delicious dessert. And an awesome server. All in, this was a great down to earth place to spend my dinner in Vegas.

Yummy food and great service. Webcam as a group and surprised there is big enough table cooking table for all of us. Very comfortable seating and friendly service. Will definitely come back the next time we visit!

We had the Gangnam grill that was rated #1 it has several starters including fresh oysters, calamari, green salad, etc. bbq dishes include Korean Prime Kalbi, filet mignon, Bulgogi, etc they had a big salad. everything was delicious and seasoned well. The food cooked pretty fast. The complimentary sides were great as well esp the dried squid, cucumber kimchi, & bean sprout. The decor is elegant and romantic. The service is great! You can write a review and get a free desert.
Saturday night & we beat the crowd so we were seated right away. Fast service. Great food in a great atmosphere. Bulgogi bibimbap is BOMB!

Oh my god this was the best food I've ever had in my whole life. It was an endless trough of goodness. I especially like the bulgogi. I was amazed by the personable waitstaff. The drinks were bottomless and the green apples soju cooler was fucking amazing. If you don't come here while in Las Vegas you might as well say that you were never here. It's a great deal. Great value for the money. Great atmosphere.
Authentic Korean BBQ. I do recommend this place for anyone who loves Korean food. We have tried the original Bimbimbap; it is really good.
We ordered gangnam for 2 people and Shishito pepper! There are a lot of meat and small dishies! The food tastes so great and we loved it!!

By far the best kbbq in town! We went in for happy hour; ordered beef toro,pork belly abd bulgogi which were only $4 each. Also all the drinks are 50% off. Enjoyed all of their food we ordered. I have been going to Hwaro but will come to this place. This joint is legit!
Fast service!! Friendly staff! We had a really great time and will be back. We got the meat lovers for two which was more than enough food for 4 with a few extra sides
This is the best Korean BBQ place. Quality!!! Try the 2 for $89.00 meal. Simply awesome.
This is the first restaurant i eat in Las Vesgas. Really made my day LOL!!!十分不错的一家韩版烤肉，十分推荐再次光临！！
Nice clean atmosphere. Free Korean appetizers. Good prices. Definitely a good place off the busy strip but near our hotel.
Amazing food. First visit ever and didn't think it would be this good. Make sure to try the Kobe beef
Great for families I recommend the meat lover it says good for 2 $55.95 but our family of 5 ate it and still had leftovers. It is close to campus if you are a college student! Good BBQ!

Omg. The food was delicious! 
Our group was 4 people.
We got the butterfly and firecracker shrimp. Bulgogi bimpap and bbq the following meats: grade a kalbi, kurobuta sausage and shrimp. Most delicious yall! Im coming again tomorrow night. Love how they stay open late and offer delicious food with awesome service. The apple sake was yum as well, just keep it nicely chilled. Going back tomorrow for the lychee sake (:
Great place! Delicious food. Staff was really nice. The meat was great quality and it's hard to find a good Korean barbecue place in Las Vegas

Got the bacon-wrapped scallop and marinated Kalbi.  Also, most reviewers haven't mentioned the sodas are bottomless for only $2.75.

You have the option to grill at your table or in the kitchen, but table side is definitely the way to go to control your level of done-ness (and I hope you are getting at least one beef dish at Korean bbq).

It's more like a 3.5 but I'll round it up to a 4. 

Their set meals(and they have a few you can pick from) are really awesome. We had 10-11 people and they gave a huge portion that was able to fill us up with only $20-22? each. THe reason why it's more like a 3.5 is because the quality meat is only okay. It really could be better but of course it's still better than your typical AYCE bbq. I actually think the meal went from great to good. Their appetizers( the little small dishes that korean places serve were great and we got soup, bibimbap(which I thought was really good and flavorful). They also had their happy hour from like 9-close? or something like that but i have to say the meat(pork belly + beef toro) weren't great all even though it was the happy hour price. 

Regardless, I think for a bbq place like this, they give you a great portion for a good price is the reason why I gave it a 4. It's not the best non-AYCE place but their set meals are nice and worth it.

One of the best new places I've been to highly recommend... A lot of choices. All marinated stuff is on point !!!!will definitely come
Back next time in Vegas

Was excited to try this place because of all the good reviews on here but when my boyfriend and I walked in, we stood at the entrance for a good ten minutes and no one even acknowledged us or helped us. Walked out and no one noticed. Customers who were currently in the restaurant just stared at us like we were lost. Didn't like the vibes. Won't even be giving this place another try. What a shame. Bad service for sure.

Very reasonable prices, top notch quality, hands down the best Korean BBQ in Vegas.  Worth the visit, just a short drive from the strip.  The Beef Toro and the Pork Belly are great.

The decor and service are outstanding.  This is definitely a place you will visit more than once.

Delicious! All the food was amazing and very filling!

We ordered the Gangnam plate and it exceeded my expectations!

Definitely recommend and will come again
Enjoyed!  Got the Gangnam dinner for 4.  Good meats and tasty side dishes.  Great lunch deals! ^^
I can't believe I haven't been here before when I live a block away!! Best Korean BBQ I had a very long time. Must try it when in Vegas! Or just a local in town looking for good Korean bbq
Got here around 3pm. Got seated very fast. We got 2 combo for 5 people which was perfect amount. We were all very full. Good quality meat.  Woot.

It is awesome for beef bbq.
We ordered marinated beef and original no marinated beef. 
Even though no marinated one is 3rd rank, it was the best taste for me. 
We also ordered spicy pork and and pork belly. But those were just ok. 
But once again their no marinated original beef is tender and beautiful flavor. 
Definitely recommend.

First experience with Korean BBQ and it was delicious. We are on vacation in Las Vegas and decided to stop here. Decided on the Gangnam Grill combo for two and it was more than enough food. Staff was friendly and extremely helpful. Would definitely recommend.
We ordered the meat lover for lunch and it was great. Delicious, good service, and good portion. Also free dessert for writing a review haha.
The steamed Kali bowl was 10. So tender. I will definitely be back.  Was Busy but service was good.
Brought my wife here for her birthday and service was great, food was great and reminded me of Korea Town Los Angeles!!!   Can say it's the best in Vegas!
Yummy yummy~ i like the appetizer and the meet here...very good restaurant ...sure next time when I visit Vegas will come back to this GANGNAM BBQ~

Came here after a 5hr drive from Page,AZ and was definitely looking for somewhere to fill up our hunger. So being from LA, first thing to do was look for somewhere like KBBQ. And this place definitely filled that gap of hunger. True, it's not like LA's but it has good taste. Service was great and the food was satisfying. My recommendation would be to get the meat lover :D

This was our first time trying a Korean style BBQ place.  Fortunately, it was a great experience!  We chose the Gangnam Dinner and were greeted with various cuts of beef and pork marinated in different sauces.  While we put these on the grill to cook to our individual levels of preferred "doneness", we sampled our miso soup, our crab wontons, and our shishito peppers.  Everything was delicious, and when we finally got to start trying the stars of the meal, we were not disappointed.  Everything tasted amazing and would definitely come back to try again.  Make sure you check-in on Yelp, so you can get a free ice cream macaroon to try.
This place is probably the most delicious Korean BBQ Las Vegas.  The food was reasonably priced and the food was so good.  Service was good and the side dishes had lots of variety.
The best Korean BBQ I ever had. Everything is so fresh and flavorful. Would  come back again when I visit Vegas! Definitely recommended, great service and awesome food.

This is our first time here. Honestly, I've tried pretty much 90% of the Korean restaurants in Las Vegas. This is definitely among one of the best despite the price is a bit higher compare to others. I guess it is worth every dollar with the taste. I would recommend this place if you are looking for a new place for dinning around campus.

This was my first time here! Happy hour is worth it! Bulgogi and the brisket was ONLY $3  I was definitely happy with my choice of the garlic edamame. They play music videos inside which can be very entertaining and a great distraction if you don't have anything to talk about to your date. 

Service was welcoming and friendly. I will be back here very soon!
Best Korean BBQ in Vegas. It's all in the reviews from other people. So just try it out :)
Best food !!! Come and order the chicken with shrimp too, vegetables fresh and delicious !
Great place serves well and fast. We didn't have to wait a long time and we got free dessert!!!!!

The short ribs and pork belly here is amazing.  The short ribs were super tender and juicy.... Even when we left them on a little too long.


The green tea macaron ice cream is a must try!! Absolutely loved it.  I also really liked how the enoki mushrooms come pre-cooked in its own little package.


I would not recommend the beef toro though because it was super chewy.  I also wish they had a lettuce salad instead of charging 2.00 for pieces of lettuce.

My boyfriend and I walked all the way from the strip just to eat here and it was well worth it! Delicious Korean BBQ!  Great portions for 2. Meat was flavorful and the servers were so respectful and great.  If we live in Las Vegas, we would be here at least once a week!
The best Korean bbq..coming from a sacramento person. We had the meat lover for 2. All the side dishes were amazing as well. A must.

This is a great restaurant. The plates are small but they're supposed to be which makes it easy for sharing. The kalbi and bulgogi were my favorites. Because it's supposed to be a Japanese fusion restaurant they don't offer the type of side dishes traditionally served with Korean BBQ however kimchi and rice are the available upon request. I found this restaurant to be relatively reasonably priced for Las Vegas standards.

My husband and I have been looking for a legit Korean BBQ place that we liked in Vegas since we moved here and we finally found one. This is it. We've been pretty picky since we're comparing to LA ktown restuarants, but this place will definitely fill our void. Love the meats. We liked all the marinaded ones and the filet and the pork belly. The chadol (toro) was just ok.
Very good meat quality, good protion size, not all you can eat, but definitely enough food per order.
Really enjoyed the atmosphere.  The ordering system is easy. Not tons of meat per plate. Filet mignon was very tender. Jalapeño poppers were great!

Yummy! Such a fun atmosphere and great food. Came with the wife and ordered the Las Vegas for two and there was PLENTY of food. Service was great.  Make sure to get the special rice, I think it's called the biboi. It is way good.

Great happy hour deals! Service was attentive, food was good. Beef tongue was exceptional. Hope that the grill was not too sticky (GyuKaku has better grill). You get a free dessert when posting a review on Yelp.

Just worked a 16 hour shift and I broke my fast by grabbing some Korean food. I was in town from California to Vegas. Ordered bibimbap and I was super happy, they mixed it in front of us on a hot stone plate I was surprised because it was so different than eating in Korean food in NY home town of garden grove. I was impressed with the quick service definitely good food for a long day at a late night

We came here Friday night, i was expecting they would be really busy, but when we got there, it was just enough people, not too busy but not slow.. We got sat right away, we got the gangnam set and it was so much food, it says its for party of 2, but i think it's a lot of food just for two people unless you're a big eater.. Lol..service was really good too, and overall experience it was good..:-) we'll be back for sure..
The food is great, I love the beef and sauce, and the place is nice and clean, would recommend my friend to come here!
Food is soo good and the portions are just enough for everyone! Def recommendable and we'll be back again!
Food was awesome and incredibly priced. Service was outstanding. This place kicked ass, and it was open till 1am a huge bonus.

First time here and the food was awesome! The servers were great and very attentive and helpful! I loved the pork belly and bulgogi, very tender!! The atmosphere of the restaurant was nice and warm, great music and overall very chill place to hangout wIth friends and eat korean bbq!! Would definitely come back again!!
Delicious korean bbq! Recommend the korean prime galbi and bulgogi. Service was good and the restaurant is clean. The ingredients are fresh. Will come again the next time we're in Vegas.
Fell in love with this place! The workers are so friendly and the food is way good It's definitely worth the hype and the money! Go get the gangnam combo!
Delicious fresh food and plenty of it! Close to the strip! Clean and well maintained dining area. Great ventilation!  Recommend to all!
Good food, the portions are generous, and the service was fast. David kept my drinks topped off. Would recommend, thanks!

Great ambiance and felt like we had our own private space. The place was super chill and spacious. Great place to be in outside of the strip and away from the touristiness( but what isnt not toursity in Vegas?)

We ordered the gangnam set, beef toro, pork toro and pork belly. Side dishes were great, my favorite was the macaroni! Meat quality was actually pretty good, might be better than some of the kbbq places in LA. Personally, I like it more than Honey pig and Quarters in LA! Also wayyyyyyy better than all those AYCE places. The service was great too! Price wasnt too much as well. Would recommend to revisit!

Pretty damn good KBBQ!

Unlike other Korean spots I've been to, the vibe of this place is decorated nicely and really clean which made me feel even more comfortable with stopping by for some lunch munchies. 
 
Ordered the Meat Lovers meal for 4 people which was $99. They start you out with a nice salad topped with an Italian like dressing. Miso soup is served shortly after. The main entree consisted of Kalbi, Bulgogi, Pork belly, Spicy pork, and the only meat i was really craving on the menu, Filet mignon! Unfortunately it was also the only meat that turned out bad with whatever marinade they used. On the another note, we had reached our belly limits. The meal filled us all perfectly with a little desert room to spare.

Our server was great, and he was very consistent with checking up on us. Then again, there were only a few tables being occupied at the time Lol.
I had amazing service and the food was fantastic. The pricing was very reasonable. I will definitely be coming back.

Love this place! Very friendly staff... Not sure if they do this on a regular basis but the waitress will cook the meat for you in the beginning. We ordered the Meat lovers for my family of 4. Just enough for our appetite! Will definitely come back again!

Outsider from out of town. Wanted Korean and pulled up Yelp and this Gangnam came up. The interior design of the place felt really modern with a touch of feng shui. They have updated music videos displayed. All the servers are very nice and build a rapport with you. The food is very balance opposed to all those you can eat buffet that try to overstuff you with side condiments so you can eat less meat. The menu gives you a whole variety of things that I never seen before on a Korean BBQ menu. Plus: PRIME MEAT. Overall I give it 5 out 5 because of professionalism and true balance of the variety of the food.

This was my first time here and it did not disappoint me at all. We ordered the spicy tuna kimbap which was my favorite and for meats bulgogi, brisket, harami miso and the flat iron steak. The meats were very flavorful. Will definitely come here again(:

Such an amazing restaurant.  I never write reviews on yelp. But this restaurant is just too amazing.
Foods are great. Servers are great. Plus, atmosphere is great. Highly satisfied with everything. Thanks Gangnam!

My fav K-bbq spot in Las Vegas! The location is great, good hours for late night grub, great prices, and quality of food is amazing! Decor in here is awesome and the layout is very open. This is a perfect place for a date or group outting with friends. Happy hour is amazing with lots of choices to choose from and 50% off drinks. The dynamite shrimp is a must have. My favorite meat is the Bulgogi beef and the Korean prime kabli. The Kimchi is always good and aged well. Servers are fast and attentive. Love coming here and leave satisfied every time!

Us Californias has it pretty good... we offer some of the most delicious Korean food outside of Korea... In the land of smokes and mirrors (a.k.a. marketing gimmick that dominates the strip) the Gangnam Asian BBQ Dining has defined itself as a premier Asian food offering outside of the strip.

Way to go Gangnam Asian BBQ Dinning!
The food and service here is great. We got the meat lover combo for 6 along with kobe beef and all 7 of us ate until we were full. Would definitely recommend and come again.

Visiting from Seattle and came in hungry!
I'm glad that I found this place. The BBQ was just absolutely amazing. I would seriously fly back to Las Vegas just to eat here! 
The line was a little bit of a wait, but totally worth it.
Great meal. We enjoyed cooking on the grill at our table. The bulgogi and filet was phenomenal. As we're the sides and all the meats. The chicken was also super flavorful. Definitely recommend.

This is an amazing restaurant! This was my first experience with Korean BBQ and I will be back. Our party of five ordered the dinner for six because we were hungry. Listen to the server if she advises you to order less! Do not make our mistake! We had SO much food we couldn't believe it and it was all delicious! We had a ton of leftovers. The cream cheese wontons were terrific and I also had the ginger Soju; best cocktail ever! Each cut of meat was tasty and you cooked it as you saw fit. The servers were excellent as well. Don't miss out! Please visit this restaurant!
Very good bbq. Ate too much. Very friendly staff. The atmosphere was very nice. Music enabled good conversation.
This place is the bomb! Food is great, and excellent customer service. Price is affordable, and great ambiance too for casual dining.

The Harami Miso is really really good, definitely enjoyed it. 
Pay attention to your temperature when grilling!  Very tasty at higher temperature! Wrapping with lettuces is a great and healthy way to eat too. 
Was on a conference in Vegas, I am glad that we walked into this restaurant tonight.

I surprised this place got 4.5 stars! Got here last night had to wait for an hour. I chose to stay because of the 4.5 stars. Got the seat and immediately order the $65 package for 2 person. Banchan were not fresh. Almost all the meat choices were chewy and tough. At least the salad was fresh. In LA Japanese and Korean bbq that has 4.5 - 5 stars they use imported charcoal and really careful with the meat. Overall experience: disappointed. Not worth the money.

The meat was pretty high quality but I didn't like that they give out all the choices of meat from the all you can eat menu when you first SIT instead of you choosing which ones you would like. Good for someone who has never done korean bbq though. Got my free macaron ice cream for writing this review on yelp though! SWEEEEEET.

tl;dr--Recommended, though maybe without the full throated cheering from some of our fellow Yelpers.

We stopped by while working out way down the Strip due to the high praise from fellow Yelpers. On Christmas Eve, they weren't offering their usual (less expensive lunch menu) but hats off to the hardworking crew for working over the holidays. It's a mile or so east of Planet Hollywood so plan to drive or Lyft over unless you need the exercise.

The restaurant was basically full at 2:30 in the afternoon, which we took as a good omen. The banchan (free appetizers) came out even before we ordered and included a macaroni salad alongside the more typical kim chi, pickled spiced cucumbers, bean sprout salad, pickled radish and fish cake. The bean sprouts could have used a touch more seasoning but were otherwise fine.

The meats were well seasoned, so much so that we didn't much miss the traditional dipping sauces. We ordered a bibimbop that came in the traditional stone bowl but was not hot enough rice to crisp the rice. The bulgogi that came with the bibimbop was excellent but the only other sides were hints of red peppers and onions: order only as a side to accompany your BBQ and not as a meal.

The grill and exhaust hood were carefully maintained: gleaming metal shiny clean. Bathrooms were clean as well.

Service is typical for Asian restaurants: workmanlike but not particularly friendly. A bit slow but chalk that up to the steady stream of diners.

The kids gave it a 4 so we will round up from 3 or 3.5.



Disclosure: we were offered a free dessert for this review. Ice cream macaroons were delicious!

We were looking for something not in the casino but good and stumbled across this place on Yelp and with the amount of reviews and the high remarks we jumped in an uber and headed here. It is delicious we are not disappointed, we did the meat lovers and it is so much food. So happy we discovered this gem.
This place is amazing!!!!!! And the Kobe ssam is now my new favorite here! 100% recommend.

Great service! Food was great and not too pricy! Jin was our server and he was basically a certified bad ass. He was shooting first and taking names after. He even offered to beat the other server for turning our hot stove off, and for that I salute him.
Good service, nice portions.. but honestly, the meat isn't the best. It's ok.. just not top notch.
Amazing service. Super quick in getting our meal and orders. Highly recommend it even it is kind of expensive, it's worth it!
Great food! The Hirami Miso is a must! Our server was very caring and fun! Overall, great food and great service!

This place was great. The staff was so nice! 
Good vibes and large family room. 
Portions were plentiful. 
Love it and we will definitely be back!!

Gangnam set is the best value!
They come with vary of delicious meats.
I recommend this set for economy meal ;)
Amazing Korean BBQ here. Make sure to try the ramen also. Quality meat and seafood! Definitely coming back.

It took us a while to get the menu, but once we ordered the food came fast. All the BBQ  varieties were excellent. Especially the bimbambap. It was crazy good. The sides were Ok, but but I have tasted better. 

Overall, I would be back here, especially for lunch, I think their lunch menu is very reasonable. Will be back for more!

A Vegas staple.  I've been here about 30 times, the galbi is best because they remove it from the bone. This is the best Korean bbq you will find...if you are looking to get a tattoo and your nails done on either side of the location.  I like the constant stream of K-pop and gangsta rap.

Get the Korean galbi and don't forget the enoki mushrooms.
great environment and music. service was also good. we ordered a soups and ramen, and they were  good. the ramen i ordered was very korean, just like xin ramen.
Got a bunch of bbq dishes and the bibimbop. Kalbi was very good meat quality and bibimbop was yummy. Would recommend to anyone who wants good Korean food.

Came on a Tuesday night for an early dinner and we got right in. It is now one of my favorite Korean BBQ places! The meats were great and seasoned just like the BBQ I've had in Seoul. Sides were excellent as well. Can't wait to come back next time I'm in Las Vegas
Excellent food. Got the combo meat lover for two. The meat is high quality and good variety.
I ordered Korean chicken tenders and chicken fried rice. For the price of both, it was well worth it. The ambiance is also nice and it gave me a good first impression right as I walked in the door.

GangNam Asian BBQ is an amazing little gem located near the Hard Rock Casino that offers a wide variety of delicious meats & appetizers and are reasonably priced. The cool thing is you get to cook the food on the grill located in the center of the table, which allows different people to cook their meat to their own liking. I recommend the Korean Prime Kalbi as the taste is superb to others I've had. A great addition to the meats and amazing appetizers they offer, you'll receive around 6 side dishes to accompany your meal. The pickled ones are not my favorite but I'm not particularly a big fan of that in the first place. The staff is very pleasant and is quick to help. I like the style of the atmosphere, low lighting with huge tables and they play a wide variety of music and play the actual music video. They also have a TV playing sports just in case you are into that. Overall I'd highly recommend this place to anyone who enjoys Asian BBQ.

It's the best Korean BBQ ever! Love love kobe style beef cuz u can feel it melting in ur mouth. We tried couple kinds of meat and they were all juicy, tender and full of flavor. The side dishes, salad, appetizers were just nothing to complain. Will definitely come back again!!
Service was good. All proteins were good. The appetizers were a little lacking. Overall very good experience!
Very unique cuts of meat. Top your typical Korean BBQ. We got the gangnam combo and it was delicious. Highly recommended

If you're looking for great Korean BBQ close to the strip, this is the place although not offering an all you can eat option the portions are more than enough and very reasonably priced. I highly recommend they may look busy but you will be seated quickly and be provided with great service.

I love coming to Gangnam! We usually come to their happy hour and have a great time. We got the Gangnam special which we shared between three people and got a few happy hour stuff on the side which was perfect for us. It's also a pretty convenient location because it's in the middle of Vegas right near the strip so I would definitely check it out if you're close by!

Also don't forget to save room for dessert~

:) this place is hella bomb

I recommend ordering 4 for 3 peopl. It leaves enough food for late night munchies:)
We got the Gangnam meal and it was so worth! Meat was great and they were generous on the portions.
OMG best BBQ I have tried all around the states. Better than GYU and all others in ktown New York. I can't say any more of being so satisfied. Thank you!
Great food! Awesome service. :) will definitely return with friends and colleagues when we are here in Vegas.
Kobe Sam is so yummm. fantastic！the first time here with frds and we all think the food is amazing！！！definetely wanna come next time
Great Korean BBQ at reasonable price. Recommend meat lovers and a la carte during happy hour.

Food was delicious and tasty. I highly recommend the meat lover combo deal.  It was plenty of food for 3 people although it is recommended for 2 people. 

Service was prompt.  We came after prime time.  If you go during prime time, then you can expect to wait a long time.

If I could rate this place higher than 5 stars I would.  The food was amazing, the service was fast, wonderful and they all worked together as a team.  I hope this place stays around forever as I would love to return here often.
Great lunch special here as always. Each time we visit LV, we always come here for a visit. Must try and highly recommend this place.
Service was awesome. Went during happy hour 3-6pm which is a good deal for the selections they had. Food was delicious. A must try!
Good service and environment. Food is great and price is reliable. Must try!!! It's a must bombed the GangNam combination is the best choices . # 1 BBQ korean so far
Place is nice, good food, happy house is pretty cool. Sides were fresh, service is fast, food is fresh. What else can you ask for? This place has good reviews for a reason :)

Was looking for some good American barbecue but stumbled upon this on yelp instead. The boyfriend loves Korean barbecue so so we decided to try it.

We didn't realize it was one of those places where you cook your own food at a grill and your table. It was such a pleasant surprise. The food was great, staff was friendly, place is clean and not too expensive. A fun and tasty experience!
First time to come here. Very good experience. If u r meat lovers, u will like it very much.

All around 5 stars

Service was timely and accommodating. Especially when it came time for the check even with a full dining room. Nothing ruins my meal more than a laggy check. A plus plus. 

Food is a decent price for the variety and quality of meats, appetizers and sides. No all you can eat. But I definitely left full and satisfied with what I paid for. I feel like you can't go wrong with anything you choose. But something def worth mentioning are the desserts. The green tea cheesecake is fire. I would also suggest getting the yuzu sorbet to accompany it. 

Haven't been for happy hour yet. But totally seems worth it based on my experience with dinner.
Food and service were amazing! Jalapeño poppers were delicious and they offer a decent happy hour. Super good.

I can see why this place has so many good reviews! Food was great, service was great! You get to cook your own meat with the grill. We got the pork belly, basil chicken and a variety of other meats and veggies. The steamed egg was huge! And so good! I would definitely come back here again.
The food is exceptionally good, moderately priced and so fun to cook! Great environment, great music and friendly courteous staff. Recommend to all my friends and will be coming back regularly.
great koren bbq food. We travel to Las Vegas a lot and we will visit it every time. The meat is very fresh, especially the Kobe beef, my favorite!

This is the kind of Korean BBQ that let you cook right at the table.  The quality of the meat was great so you can't really go wrong.  The selection was massive too -- much more so than any other Korean BBQ that I've frequented.  The beef tongue was my favorite, but then again, all things beef were great.  The seafood was decent, then again I didn't go there for the seafood.  You order ala carte, but the price is still very reasonable. The staff was friendly and attentive -- perhaps too friendly.  We had the back-room booked for a party of 10, but the previous party was taking way longer than expected.  The staff would not hurry them up so they had to sit us elsewhere.  Still, if you are looking to gorge yourself in some quality meat, you will not be disappointed in this place.
I loved the food here! It was weird to cook your own food, but a great experience. The staff was really friendly. I would definitely recommend. :)

Great food! Great service!
Great prices for Happy Hour. Must get spicy chicken and spicy garlic edamame is to die for!
Sukiyaki noodles are great!
This place is must visit Korean BBQ when you in Las Vegas! The prices is reasonable and the food is fresh! And the restroom is clean!
Food is awesome! I love the Spicy Tuna Fried sushi! Service and environment are also good!
They were so friendly & food was great! I ordered a Bibimbap and it was really big & yummy. My friends got beef & noodle & soup, and we all enjoyed the food! Will come back soon
The staff and the food are first class. I would advise all to get off the strip and try this Korean BBQ only 5 to 10 minutes from strip and if your at the MGM it is a must
Food was delicious at a great price. I'm from NYC and the food was way better than NY Korean bbq

My first time here was a year ago and I just had to put it on my list of places to go during my trip to vegas. The food was delicious just like last time and the prices are still great! I will definitely be coming back on my next trip.
Came to Vegas and really wanted some good Korean food, this place hit the spot! Everything tasted great and great atmosphere.

Definitely coming back to this KBBQ spot!   The food was amazing.  Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is cause the service was just OK...

We got the 'Meat Lovers' package and substituted the spicy pork for Kalbi instead.   So BOMB.

!!!have to check this place!!!
food - great [beef toro]
service - friendly
price - fair [5ppl $35]
 
8.5 / 10 pts

* all the beef are great

Okay guys, discard my last review. Since that REVIEW WAS FAKE just for some free dessert and so is everyone else review that is to here. I had to delete it because it was so untrue about this place.

This place sucks balls. I'm not comparing it to LA at all. They charge for sesame oil and salt and salad? $4.75 for a steamed egg? You got to be kidding me. Plus they're portions are so small and expensive, I couldn't even get full! Oh and rice was $2 for a small bowl...

So literally each place of meat only has 6 small pieces for $9. So we pretty much ordered everything in the meat section and some bacon wrapped scallops snd salmon. Those were honestly okay. 

We decided to try something new by getting cheese fondue with broccoli. BIG MISTAKE. It was literally Kraft single cheese with oil? It didn't even melt right over the fire and wouldn't even stick on the broccoli. 

SERVICE? Okay they were attentive when it came to ordering... But when we tried to refill our bachan they never came of course . We tried refilling twice on radish and bean sprouts! They said yes and then never return with it! 

Plus when we received our bill they didn't put our drinks on HH and we had to tell them. *eye rolls* 

Overall, I regret coming here based off fake reviews. I should of when to Gyu-Kaku.  Don't waste your money here.
this place is absolutely amazing!! Staff is very friendly. The food is really good as well.

Update: came back for happy hour and the prices were great. Service was great too. Would highly recommend for others to try!!


The food was amazing! It definitely is quality you can taste!! The servers were attentive and demonstrated teamwork. The 1.5 hour wait was worth it and we will definitely return next time we visit Vegas!! The only improvements I can recommend are the seats (really hard and uncomfortable) and the waitlist protocol. They should have a buzzer or take down phone number to send a text. We had to wait even longer because they supposedly called out our name four times and we went for a stroll since there were still 6 parties in ahead of us.

Looking for serious MEAT? This is your place. You get all the little dishes of mystery treats PLUS the tastiest protein you've ever stuffed in your face hole. 

Come with friends and impress them with your ability to consume vast quantities of kimchee.

Great experience! First Asian bbq style dinner for us. The staff were more then helpful getting us on the right track, taking their time to explain everything and answering my questions. Went with the premium selection and was not disappointed

Ordered the Meat Lover's for 2 people and it was plenty of food to share with 3 since portions are huge. The sides were delicious and service was really great. I will definitely come back to this place when I'm in Vegas again.

It's so delicious ~ I feel happy and excited. .
This is so amazing services. .I prefer  choosing bibmbap and kalbi.

Had the package deal for 6 and we have 7 people in our group. Penlty of food good enough for party of 8. Meat was fresh and tender. The marinated meat was a little on the sweet side. Kobe beef excellent.
Good experience..meats were well seasoned. Come with an appetite..a lot of food included in the Meat Lovers meal..
What's great place to eat!!! The uni bibimbap was off the hook!!! The spicy tofu soup was great!!! I highly recommend this pace. A treasure off the strip!!!

Brought the wife to Vegas for a birthday roadtrip and this place was first on our list of new places to try.  They did not disappoint!  Awesome flavors and textures. Plus the social experience of cooking our own meat.  Lunch special was more food than i eat at dinner.  Plus as the bonus free desert for reviewing. Good or bad.  It happens to be great come try this place.

My husband and I are in Vegas and we have a craving for Korean food.  This place has a lot of great reviews and we thought to give it a try.  It was absolutely awesome!  Well worth it!  The staff is attentive and very friendly.  Definitely a place that we will visit again when we come back to Vegas.

First time here. we came a few minutes before the happy hour and the host graciously allow us to order from happy hour menu.
we ordered pork belly, salmon, mixed tempura and chicken tender in cheese.
it didn't disappointed :-)
i also like the side dishes.
definitely will visit when we go to LV :-)
Amazing.  I brought my friends here to show them "culture" and they were super impressed with the food, service , atmosphere, everything.  Highly recommend!
Meat quality was good. Good soju cocktail choices. Happy hour from 3pm to 6pm lately. Great place for special occasion.
The food is awesome... Ordered the gangnam grill set and we have 3 people and we have leftover!
We ordered las vegas combo, great for two  people.So nice and friendly, Very good place for dinner!

Nice and authentic BBQ, good price, good service!
If you want to try korean BBQ in Las vegas, I think This is the place to go.
The good was ok, I thought it was a little spendy  the service was very slow.  I wish they would bring everything out at one time.

This place is somehow in my bookmarks list. Someone recommended it to me in case I go to Vegas. We were supposed to go to a buffet at the strip (Caesar's), but the line was too long. Luckily we found this place! 

This isn't too far from the strip. It's located in a plaza and there's plenty of parking. We came around 10:40 pm and got seated in less than 10 minutes. We also got our food pretty quick after ordering. It took them 5-10 mins to get the main dishes and a total of  less than 30 mins for everything else. My only complaint is that the booth that we got (located on the right side) was very awkward to sit on for me. I'm a short Asian person. Anyone who's probably 6' and muscular/big build would sit comfortably in this booth. The seat is too far from the table. Other than this, everything is perfect. 

We ordered the Gangnam Combo and substituted the Green Salad and Koshitsu Pepper Yuzu for the Broccoli Cheese Fondue and Squash Tempura. The Broccoli is okay, not really mouthwatering. My favorites are the beef toro, Korean prime kalbi, 4 out of 8 of the banchans, Mushroom Medley, and the Oysters!!! The Oysters are definitely one of the best ones I've had. 

For dessert, we got the Mango Macaron Ice Cream and Tempura with Green Tea Ice Cream. Both free woot!

Overall, this competes with the Korean BBQ places in LA, but cheaper. Awesome!

Such a nice atmosphere! The meets are great quality and filled with flavor. I love how they also give the customers different sauces as well since I love full flavors and sauces. Hehe, definitely coming back. The happy hour is great. Their drink menu is awesome as well, you MUST try the lychee martini, so yumzz! :)

From the Korean Snob again. Food quality was good. My male Korean server needs to be fired or re-trained. Never checked on us, didn't ask me if I wanted rice (dude, what Korean male doesn't eat rice?), no refills, and kept forgetting items we ordered (I can go on and on, but you get my point). Another individual who thinks minimum wage should be $15 per hour, but can't figure out why his tip is too low. 

This place is nothing special, when compared to other traditional Korean bbqs. However, I would give this place 3 1/2 Stars if Yelp would let me. 

I wish the ventilation was better here.
Great food we had the meat lovers BBQ! Food was delicious and the service was great ! Would definitely come again !
The food was very well prep and tasted very delicious. Will definitely come back again. The pork belly was my favorite.
I'm only here for the ice cream. All of the food was AMAZING and the prices are reasonable for the volume. Would recommend to anybody in the area.

Foods are great. You pretty much can't go wrong with anything on the menu. Foods are just great that my gf and I came back for the second time. The lunch special is a great deal. We tried really hard to finish everything on the table. The Korean prime beef and the Korean chicken are just delicious. Must try!
Delicious Korean food and great portions for a good price! The combo deals are the best value!

A great find! My husband is Korean so he's VERY particular about Korean restaurants. We were kind of hesitant that it was a fusion between Korean and Japanese. First impression, very cute place. Greeted right off the bat... Very impressed with the food we ate. Full of real authentic flavor.. The Kim Chee was fermented to perfection. Reminded him of Momma's. Great service, cool music videos playing on the big screen. We were very happy customers!
Meats had good flavor and the banchan were delicious. Definitely, going to try more dishes.
Yummy^^great Vegas experience. Nice staff and great music. GD and Taeyang in the house whoo!!

Came here to eat some Korean food and I was just blown away by how good it was. We ordered many different types of meat and all of them were very tender and good. This place uses real good quality meat. 

Another awesome thing about this place is the service. The staff here are A+++++ when it comes to service. Jin was awesome in giving us the best service possible. 

I am definitely coming here everytime i come to vegas.
Great food! The meat is on point and service is fast! We ordered the meat lover for two special. Recommended to my friends!
Always the best dining at Gangnam when visiting from L.A. great selection of good quality meat and great pricing. Staff is always nice.
Glad to have some good korean/asian bbq near the strip. Quality of meats are good (had the korean kalbi and pork belly).   Quality of Banchan was good as well.

The hype is real!!! The best Korean bbq in Vegas; good thing I live far a way or else I'll be here everyday. 
Service is excellent as well.
Amazing! Great experience, great food, great service. Lots of fun to cook the food and the sides were delicious.
Pretty good restaurant, nice meat. I take off one star because there's no free lettuce for the wrap :(
Authentic korean restaurant. Love their kimchi! Their bbq shrimp is very fresh and the marinated korean kalbi is very tender. Would recommend this restaurant to korean food lovers.
The portions are very generous. Ordered Gangnam for two and it easily fed 3 people. Food is good and the servers are attentive.

We found it on Yelp！Very delicious！
Best Korean BBQ in Las vegas！
we have a big meal！
Wonderful！

I have a Korean food conundrum.... I love Korean food and culture... but despite that, have rarely had any good Korean restaurant experiences.... My first child hood best friend was the son of a Korean diplomat and I discovered teok galbi and mandu guk by the time I was 6. Discovered Korean club rats a decade and a half later.... And then one day, Gangnam opened up in Vegas. 

I like Gangnam for several reasons... I love Korean food but am not a KBBQ fan. I just don't like the idea of paying to cook my own food....which brings me to the point that already prepared dishes are generally overpriced in Korean restaurants, and service can be such that unless you're getting KBBQ, the staff will try to lead you into ordering the most expensive prepared dishes, claiming they're all that's available, etc as you're taking up expensive BBQ realty... 

Gangnam is different... they'll cook your KBBQ for you in the kitchen without a problem if you ask them to, and the prepared dishes are affordably priced. Plus, the service is the best I've yet to experience at a Korean restaurant. The K Pop star looking staff is extremely professional, courteous and offer service that's on par with that in much pricier restaurants. 

As far as the food goes, I really like the spicy pork bento box... yeah, they use jalapenos instead of Korean chilies but... it still tastes good and has just the right kick without being too spicy. The bul gogi jap chae is really good...as are the seafood pancakes. But my favorite dish is the steamed short rib with rice. Pair that with an ice cold Hite and you have a perfect meal. 

I know some people complain about the lack of ban chan, but you can get kimchi if you ask for it, and other accompaniments are around one or two dollars. While it may not be an authentic aspect of Korean dining, I think it minimizes food waste.

My second time here and I'm always in awe when I am here! I really love ordering the meat lovers or gangnam! I have brought my family here as long as my boyfriend for the first time and I'm pretty pleased!
Everything was great! The BBQ was amazing. The Kim chi chegae hit the spot. Bibimbop was delish! Must try!

The food and atmosphere is great! I came here for my sister's Bachelorette party! The side dishes are amazing!

Note: If you give a Yelp review you can get free desserts, one dessert per one review per person! We all got delicious macaron ice cream! :)

AHHHHH it reminds me of Gyukaku (for those of you who know the place) 
I love korean bbq as well as japanese yakiniku, so we had to stop by while we were in vegas after new years. 
Wait time was spot on as the waiter told us it would be 45min. 45 min later we get to our seat. 
Really clean place and the ventilation system was Awesome! i was really impressed because I've been to a lot of yakiniku and korean bbq places in japan, korea, and hawaii and have notices some places being really smoky and smelly and some other places really good too. But This place probably had the best system i've seen around.
After leaving the place my clothes barely smelled like BBQ and that itself should be given 5 stars.
Meat prices were decent and the side plates were really good.

Service was A+ and everyone was helping each other out which was nice so that we didnt have to wait for "our" waiter like you have to do in basically all other american restaurants.

Anyways short review: Food was amazing, Service amazing. Gonna eat here again when i pass by again.

Just looking at the food, it looks really delicious....i can't wait to eat it especially all the meat, I'm seriously gonna eat all of the meat haha. Just tasted the overflowing steam egg, it taste really good. Can't wait until the meat is all cooked!

So we were told that we have to wait for more than an hour when we arrived, but then it actually took only like 20 minutes to be seated. Side dishes are good:)
BBQ was awesome!!! Everything is wonderful..
It's a nice dinning spot! ;)
Great Korean bbq! So much fun on my dads birthday! Great selection of meat and lots of sides. Love the cheese dip! We will be back again. Lots of food for two people.

Love this place!! Great atmosphere, good drinks, and good service.  We've been to sura BBQ before, but it does not compare.  Clean place ands good location.  We will definitely be coming back and telling our friends and family about this place.  We ordered the gangnam special (which was more than enough food) and a bottle of soju.  The waiter was above and beyond.  When he served us the soju he noticed that the shot glass was not clean and came back with a new one.  This has been the best experience with the most friendly staff.

Really good barbecue in an unexpected location. Tender meat and even the bulgogi bibimbap was really good. I especially liked the unmarinated galbi and enoki mushrooms.  Service was good even though we were a large group. Decent side dishes.

We order Gangnam meat combo for two. So much delicious food and dessert!!! BBQ here is great!  Meat tender and flavor, great start to our Las Vegas vacation.   Ugh, i will be daydreaming about this meal as we hike Death Valley!

Oysters fresh, mushroom tender, and squid so QQ tender

Will definitely recommend this!
Excellent place especially for late night value, go for happy hour apps.  Bi bin bap, calamari,  chicken karage, cream cheese wonton
Amazing food and atmosphere, the beef bulgogi is on point. Great place for a dinner party, we got the Vegas platter.

Great food and great service.  We love it!! Especially I like Harami miso.
I absolutely come back.

A really cool, fun and unique dinning experience. Vary flavorful marinades on the meats, great sides, and very attentive staff. I would recommend the Kalbi beef and spicy chicken. Price was also very affordable for the quality.

They should be honest about the waiting time. We were told the waiting time is 20-25min when we came in, but in reality we have been seating here waiting for an hour, and there are still several groups in front of us. If they have told us we need to wait for more than 1 hr we would choose a different restaurant to eat.

可愛的帥哥們，個個都很帥耶！
食材真的很美味！。每種肉，看著美味！吃得更可口！
來到這裡的每一人！都滿懷感激不盡的出去

this is really a recommended Korean bbq!!! Pork belly, enoki with bacon, Harami miso are the ones you must try! And kimchi bibimbap is really good and with large quantity. We four can share one bibimbap. And the servers are pretty nice!
We waited a little even though it was a weekday but it was worth it. i thought the kalbi steam with rice was bomb. will come again when i get the chance!
Very authentic good Korean. Good service, clean.  Would be back. Happy hour menu also good. 10 pm to close.
Food is good and high quality. Must try Kobe beef and short ribs! They are awesome! Service is really good as well. We asked them to refill side dishes and change grills and they're responsive.

With the various appetizers and meat, it was an amazing experience for me, especially on my first time. We ordered fried calamari, cream cheese wontons, mixed tempura, etc. for our appetizers. The pork belly and bulgogi are to die for. The servers were super friendly and were there when we needed their service. There a specific server that I took a liking who constantly checked on us and he made my stay more pleasing! Hope to stop by when I'm in the area again!
Pretty authentic Asian bbq! Everything that we ordered tasted great. The 2 mile walk from our hotel was definitely worth it. Still loaded with people after 12am Christmas Eve...

Amazing food, the pork toro and the scallop wrapped bacon here is the best.

It's a great place for late night munchies and the reverse happy hour makes this place more than affordable for the quality of the food you get in return. Most DEFINATELY would recommend 10/10

Damn every time I have korean bbq now I expect things to go as good as gangnam.
This place doesn't need more reviews but I am bringing my opinion to help because the service here requires its own review.
These people have things figured out.
very helpful and generous.
FOOD IS ALWAYS great.
I usually surprise whoever I'm in vegas with, with gangnam as a nice meal off the strip
Nice getaway and always on point!

Came in on Saturday night and this place was totally empty. I was a party of 1 because I had been desperately craving Korean BBQ. The prices are pretty reasonable, although I know most of you will whine that they aren't AYCE. They have slightly lower prices on certain meats during lunch and happy hour. I started off with the typical pork belly, beef brisket and seaweed salad. I must say the quality of meats is a step above the other AYCE places on Spring Mtn. hence you get what you pay for. Both meats were very delicious and I was still a tad bit hungry so my server recommended to me pork toro. The meat was just okay and I actually prefer the pork belly instead of this, plus it's cheaper too. The service was good for the most part, but since the place was empty, at one point the server and host both disappeared on me, which delayed me from ordering my second round of meat. It wasn't too big a deal because someone eventually appeared again in the dinning room. I live really close to this place and I will probably be coming more often. This is a perfect option if you want Korean BBQ, but your waistline can't afford to do AYCE. Also a nice place for lunch, because if I would of stuck to the beef brisket, pork belly and rice my bill would of been around $10. Can't wait to come back especially since eating here won't break my budget.
Visited during happy hour! The food was incredibly delicious. Value/Money is spot on.

Excellent meal! My friends and I shared a meat lovers bbq option which I definitely recommend for people looking to try a little bit of everything. Happy hour starts at 10pm with discounted meat options and half off drinks! Wonderful experience overall, will definitely be back!

Spiffy place. Staff were helpful and able to accommodate to our request on item changes on the menu. Overall I would come back, I enjoyed the off the strip restaurant and recommend it to all those craving Korean bbq. Get rolling @therollingcrawfish #therollingcrawfish #yummybbq #gangnam
Food was great and with decent quality. We ordered premium set for four and we almost can't finish it. We also order beef tongue and I have to say it's the BEST beef tongue I've ever have!!!

Food was great!! I got he Spicy Chicken Karagge and the marinated rib Kalbi it was soft and tendure!! great place to go for K Bbq!! the order comes with 7 side dishes that all taste great. I'd recommend it any day and will return again!!

My favorite Korean BBQ place in Vegas! Whenever I visit Vegas, I make sure to come here. Their Kobe Beef and filet Mignon are good. We had the Premium set which is $89.95 for two people. It is so worth it. You get Tuna Poki, fresh oysters, salad, and more appetizers. Nice decor, good service, and tasty food. What more do you want after a tiring day in Vegas?!
I love Kobe beef and I rate theirs an 8/10 scale.  The Kobe Ssam was exceptional as well as the Uni Bibimbap!  Highly recommended...
Must try the Kobe beef carpaccio, it was mouth watery and delicious. Service was attentive and friendly. Price was extremely reasonable.
The pork belly and jalapeño poppers are definitely worth trying! The macron ice cream cake are good too. Happy hour is fun!

Everything was delicious! I had the Korean Prime and it was soooo tender and flavorful! I also had the prime Kalbi and it was also yummy. For dessert, I went with the green tea mochi and it was simple perfection. I would totally come back to this place again!

Great service. Amazing food. For 5 of us, we got the Gingham food share that meant for 6 people. Keep in mind, we were 5 hungry mofos. We ate until we were so full, I suspected some of us went to vomit so we could make more room. Hence the bad bathroom smell (only negative but not enough to deduct a star)
The food consisted of meats, plenty of veggies and side dishes. I ordered the squid as a side dish. It was a little disappointing, 5 pieces that shrunk into nothingness. But the meats were more than made up for that.
You grill your own food, there are 3 sauces to dip it into. Overall, great flavor, great service, painfully full belly afterward.
Fantasic and very prompt service. The food was exceptional. I will be returning soon and recommending to friends.
Good service,  good korean BBQ, ambience is good and it's centrally located, right across from the Hard Rock Hotel.

They play the music videos to the songs playing on the wall, it was fun but can be distracting!

All of the meat was fresh and the sides were delicious. We got the meat lovers and I would suggest saving all your rice for the end because you get a lot with all the sides and starters I would hate for you to fill up in the rice like me! 
Delicious!
Great food and experience. Would definitely recommend it.  We ordered the gangnam style for 2 and it was plenty of food for 3.
Wonderful place to celebrate a special occasion! We had a party of 7 and had a short wait time. Service was friendly. So much food was brought out! Yummy and filling.
Awesome place!  Lots of food for a fair price.  Tastes amazing and the atmosphere is nice.  The service is outstanding and the server Beck is a trip.  10/10 would do it again.

We came for dinner after a really long day and everything was awesome...perfect timing also because they have reverse happy hour! Soju  Food was delicious and service was great and attentive and food came out in a timely manner..considering the price the portions were good...Would definitely come back next time we're in Vegas! It was our best meal of the day...wayyyy better than our $60 sausage, egg and toast breakfast!!!!!!!!  lol
Great food，easy parking and spacious environment. We ordered the meat lover and banana tempora

**D-D-DON'T BELIEVE THE HYPE**

Umm, how on Earth did this place get 4.5 stars?!

Took a taxi here from the Strip.

PARKING
=======
Packed strip mall.

AMBIANCE
=========
Videos of hip hop and K-pop.
Dark and limited booth seating.
Staff was friendly enough.

FOOD
=====
LUNCH FOR 2 - GANGNAM COMBO - $65
Yes, that's a lot of food and pricey for 2 people at lunch
(in East LV, more or less).

MEATS
Favorite was the prime kalbi - everything else was tough.
RATING: 3/5

Favorite was their BEEF CARPACCIO. 
RATING: 4/5

BANCHAN
Not super fresh (I'm spoiled in LA)
and underwhelming, except for the tofu and salad.
RATING: 3/5

RICE AND MEATS
Decent and delicious with fatty bits.
RATING: 4/5

BEVERAGE
=========
HOUSE SAKE (COLD)
OK, at best. Not smooth.
RATING: 3/5

SERVICE
=======
Felt somewhat rushed at times.
Never refilled any of our banchan.
The guy kept coming back and forth after we told him 
that we were hanging out for a bit and pacing ourselves.
There was no line, no people waiting, I didn't understand the rush.
RATING: 3/5

OVERALL
=========
Does not hold a candle to LA's KBBQ joints. #sorrynotsorry
CANNOT BELIEVE how many people gave this place 5 stars. 

NOT RECOMMEND, if you're that drunk, eat pho instead.
Cheaper and better.

This place is wonderful! My friend and I ordered the meat lovers meal for 2, I highly recommend if you are indeed a meat lover & crave variety. The sides also added the perfect touch of sweet and spice, leaving you're mouth watering for more. I would advise to come to this restaurant with a huge appetite because it is a lot of food! I will definitely be back
This is the best restaurant I Have eaten at in Las Vegas. I will be back!!!!! Get the premium cut it is worth it!
Good amount of food~ it's clean and nice atmosphere. Definitely try the spicy tuna kimbap

Came during Happy Hour with my husband and daughter, so instead of getting the Meat Lovers, we ordered 3 orders each of Beef Toro & Pork belly. Food was really good here and if you order right, Happy Hour can save you money! Not for us bc we ordered too much. Haha...and catered for non-Koreans a bit more. Everything is a la carte or you can get combo deals for 2. 
Beef Toro- slightly thicker than I am used to compared to L.A. places. Wasnt that great in tenderness or flavor so not sure what the good reviews are for.  Gave us more than expected and couldnt finish all 3 HH orders. 
Pork belly- was decent and only finished 2 HH orders of it. 
Dwenjang jigae (bean paste soup)- a bit sweet and less salty than Im used to but was good. Not a huge bowl but enough to share as a side to meats. Know that this takes longer to make so it doesnt come out right away!
Rice - only 1 comes with soup order but they give a decent amount. Also got a bowl of brown rice.  Should've just shared the one bowl.
Udon- good variety and amount of tempura. Would get tempura on the side if u like it crispy and not all soggy. 
-Spicy tuna kimbap- was yummy! Started with this (not on HH menu). 4 little deep fried rolls of plain rice in toasted seaweed but yummy cubes of tuna in spicy mayo sauce all over. Yummy!!
Everything is a la carte...side of green onions in sweet  vinegar  (pretty good), lettuce and bean paste sauce, rice...just ask bc it probably is extra, unless u ger a combo. 
-side dishes were decent and refillable if i get ar leadt 2 orders of bbq meat per person? 
-If we ordered less at first and waited to see how much came out, we wouldve saved a good amount during Happy Hour. Would have stuck with 2 HH orders of meat for each person and share one bowl of rice. GOOD SERVICE TOO!
-Can also get free macarons for yelping but didnt do that.  :)
Really good food. I love how they show Kpop MVs too!!!!! Their side dishes are also wonderful.

Amazing 

Beautiful place with mind blowing Korean BBQ

Friendly fast service 

Phenomenal good including side dishes

I had read all the Yelp reviews and had to check it out. It was everything I had hoped for and much more.

I have been to many a Korean BBQ in Los Angeles and this one was the best one hands down I have ever been.

Service was very attentive. They tried in a very friendly way to get the Bolgogi a little too quickly  -- I hadn't scraped out the crunchy delicious bits from the bottom of the bowl :)

The waiter and I had a good laugh over this and I quickly scraped the bottom and let him have the bowl.
Great meat, great service! Definitely, try next time! This is a really good korean barbecue place. It even plays music on a projector.
It is the best Korean BBQ I have ate in west US.The meats looks and tastes very flesh.

After a long week in LV for work, I was ready to go somewhere off the strip with good food and a real restaurant atmosphere. This is it. Exactly what I needed. It's noisy so probably great for that quiet dinner without a bunch of shouting back and forth. The reprieve was appreciated. 

Food was awesome. Very satisfying and plentiful. Got the Meat Lovers for two. Excellent deal - best price I've paid in LV in days. I am leaving feeling sated and ready to hit the strip again. 

Took a Lyft here from Treasure Island. Short trip - very cost effective.
Attentive and Fast service, tasty fresh cuts of bbq marinated  meats, Easy parking. Definitely will come back when craving for Korean food.
Fantastic dining experience. Visiting Las Vegas for the weekend and decided to try Gangnam Korean BBQ. So happy we did. Food and service are the absolute best!!
Food was amazing, everything tasted great! Service was awesome would definitely recommend it to any BBQ lover.

Very good selection beyond traditional Korean barbecue here. Very fresh food and very clean place. Good energy.  

We had the premium meal for two. The food comes real fast and before you know it, you're done. But with plenty of leftovers. Wagyu was nicely fresh and marbled, but tough.  The salad was awesome and fresh.  Shrimp was so so, kimchis were also so so.  Very Americanized meal.

Seating in the booths was very uncomfortable. So if there is an other option, I suggest you choose a table. Booths have very hard wooden seats with semi soft backing that was also WAY too far away from the table. Awkward seating situation that made us squirm through the meal.

They promote that you get a free dessert if you rate them on Yelp, which I think, contributes to the ratings here. They don't require a high rating, but would you eat a dessert after you show them that you just gave them a bad review? Nope.

The meat are delicious and the portions are great. The services are great. The servers are very attentive and friendly. The ambiance is very mellow and relaxing. Love the music that they play as well.
The marinade was incredible! So much food but I couldn't stop eating. Everything down to the salad and asparagus was perfect!

Plenty of food with reasonable prices!!!! I would recommend ordering the set first, so you can have a taste of variety of dishes, then if they are not enough, order the main ones. We went as 3 but only ordered the Las Vegas set for 3, but took us a while to finish this!!! Friendly and helpful staff! Awesome place. Might be a but noisy though
The food was good. Even on a busy night we were never neglected. The happy hour specials are good. The music and atmosphere are nice for a nice but not formal dinner. Great for friends or date night!

The food is amazing!! I loved the side dishes!!! They are to die for. Plus, the spicy seafood noodles, original bibimbap and spacey soft tofu is really good. The service is great. Always a great time!!!!

So good! The service was quick and we ordered the bibibamp(my FAVE) spicy chicken,bulgogi,filet Minot,calamari and tofu soup. Everything was above average and even the side dishes were tasty. I especially liked the dried squid in the side dishes-very unique from other kbbq places. I would definitely recommend
Hidden gem in off the strip! Great place to come for a fun date night or a group celebration! Lots to choose from! The bulgogi and pork belly were my favorite! Definitely coming back!

Not sure what the hype is on this place... especially if you have been to Korean BBQ restaurants in LA or NYC. 

Service: I was expecting better. The waitress didn't seem to know what she was talking about when she told us that we needed 3-4 BBQ tapas per person. We took that advice and ordered a lot of meat (more on that later). 

Food: Salty! Everything is made with extra sodium... the meat, soondubu, jap chae etc. the pork belly is full of fat. I get it's pork belly, but the cut was really cheap. We got the toro, marinated kalbi, and bulgogi and none were impressive. In fact, my party was going to ask if we can sell some meat back! The "compliment" dishes were all salty and doesn't seem fresh. It was kimchi, kimchi cucumber, mac, fish cake.

Disappointed and will not recommend.

Very good food. You might want to make a reservation first though. Oh, and don't forget you get complementary sides with your meat orders, so if you like pickled veggies, don't order too much, you can always more if you feel like you need more :)

We order the premium cut and
Food is great ,meat is excellent 
And bibinbom is excellent 
I will come again.

Second time returns
Even Better than last time !!!

Meat are top grade and tasty !!!
Best Korean food by far! Great selection and left happily fulfilled! Brought the parents here and they loved it!
Found this gem after a FULL DAY OF SHOPPING... And thank god we did, we leave Vegas tomorrow and wanted to eat something good :))!!

This place is about 2 miles off-Strip in a shopping center and offers great Korean BBQ options at a surprisingly decent price. It's probably the cheapest BBQ I've had that does not sacrifice on quality. There were many different options, a la carte or combos for 2 or more people- we decided a la carte was better since we could order exactly what we wanted. Pork belly is my favorite, so we had several portions of it in addition to the spicy pork. Also ordered kimchi jjigae on the side. The taste of the kimchi was a little off that day, so naturally, the jjigae had the same flavor, but it wasn't too bad. There was plenty of panchan, and all of the dipping sauces were complimentary, including the sesame oil and salt (they no longer charge additional for it).

Service was excellent. The servers were very friendly and attentive, refilling our drinks and panchan as needed. So glad I tried them out and would definitely consider them again next time I'm in Vegas.

We came during lunch hour. Excellent ambiance. Very chill and down beat. 

The food are beautifully presented. We ordered the Gangnam menu and it was plenty of food!

The marination is in a sweeter side. A tad too sweet and saucy for my husband taste, but they have great flavor.

Service is awesome too. Prompt and kind.

There are plethora o resto in Vegas, this is one of the handful that goes on my list.

Pretty delicious and extremely reasonable pricing considering you're in vegas. Everything tasted amazing. For 2, we ordered 4 meats (harami miso, Korean prime kalbi, bulgogi, and pork belly), corn, zucchini, steamed egg, dynamite shrimp, calamari, and an egg ramen. The only thing I'd skip on is the ramen, there's a perfect amount of food without it. Currently running a promo for free dessert for a yelp review so that's good too. :)
Still bomb. Yummy meats, sides and extras. Still have a great happy hour 3-6 and Back's service is A++.
Awesome food! We loved it! The Kobe beef was so tasty and happy hour soju is super good too! Recommend!

Went here on a whim because of the number of reviews. We had the Meat Lovers for 2 people, very good! You also get free dessert for giving a Yelp review! 

Went here for a 2nd time and they have reverse happy hour 11pm-1am. 2 meats per person comes with sides
Good quality meat at reasonable prices. Perfect way to close out a weekend in sin city.

We came here for dinner. It took about 20 minutes for waiting. But it is totally worth it! We ordered the meat lover for 2 and that is well enough for us! The beef are all sooo good! You don't wanna miss this place if you are looking for Asian bbq in Lv!

Got gangnam special. So much food! So good! The miso soup was good, so that was a positive sign of things to come! This was my first time here and I promise to be back! If you can refrain a bit, save room for the honey bread! Ridiculous!!
Great place the food was great love the flavored my favorite sake drink just a over all great experience first time here an will be returning !!

This place is the definition of the word chill. It's a nice little locale. Friendly staff and the food is cooked to your liking because well you cooked it! It's fun and very family friendly as well. Their Dynamite Shrimp is amazing; I wouldn't say it's a "dynamite" in the spice department but it is delicious!  Their selection of meats are always nice and juicy! For dessert: ice cream macaroons!

Love this place. Always come back with my family to enjoy a nice night of chill music and yummy food!! Grilling the food to your own liking is especially dope I highly recommend this place for something new!!!

Delicious food! Loved the Salmon Carpaccio, it was succulent and tasty! We enjoyed a wide range of meat and vegetables from the menu.  The kimchi and other salads provided complimented the meat chosen.  The staff was quick, efficient and very helpful.  I would definitely return for dinner or lunch!

....well i would not even give it "one star"...this place sucks one girl a desk and two guys trying to get people done....sat in the coner...7 of us and they would not even wait on us for 15 mins we got up and left...!!!!

Very good food, a little pricey than what you would expect but definitely worth it. We came in as a group of seven and they gave us their private room very closed in great for kids and family and was wonderful service

The food was terrific!  We ordered the gangnam style combo for four people and we were left stuffed!  Service was top notch; the servers were very warm and friendly.  We will be coming back here again when we visit Las Vegas!

We went here on our first night in Vegas and really enjoyed it. The meat quality is pretty good, and the price is very reasonable. 

They have great family dinner value.
The beef quality is pretty decent. Some tapas are better than Gyu Kaku. The banana tempura is great!

The food was delicious, probably best Asian bbq I ever had. The service was also very good. But better to call in advance to make sure it's not too busy because I've came few times before and the wait was more than an hour. I will definitely come back next time becuz of the food!!!
This is the restaurant that opens late near our hotel. The food and service is good and we were glad that we still have decent food close to mid night.

I wasn't too impressed with the quality of the food here. It's reasonably priced, but I wasn't feeling the selection of the food. We ordered the Kobe beef and it didn't taste like the Kobe beef I've ordered in other restaurants. The meats didn't really have much flavor and the dipping sauce was also bland. Its average Korean BBQ at best.

We arrived around 5pm and the place was packed, but the wait time wasn't that bad. I recommend getting the prime rib and galbi soup if ever you check this place out. Ventilation of the place is also great compared to other bbq places. Friedly servers are also attentive and cheerful.
Amazing quality cuts and decent prices, bulgogi is to die for. Definitely recommend this spot to friends, and I will be coming back next time I'm in town.
This is the best! Bulgogi, beef toro, and pork belly were delicious, and it i s a fun atmosphere.
Five stars for the seasoning of the meat! Also, the service and the environment are just great as the food!
Love it! I ordered the meat lover. Really good Korean Bbq. Really like the sauce. Recommended.
First time here, awesome food and ambiance! We ordered the Gangnam combination for 4 and it was a lot of food. Will definitely come back.
This place is bomb! Right from the appetizers down to the meat selection. Good portions for a great price. Digging the modern setup and the playlist! Definitely gonna come back!

We visited during Sunday noon time. Not crazy line, waited about 15 mins. We ordered prime Kaibi, beef tongue, beef toro and bulgogi. Pretty good for all, meet the 4 stars expectation. Sweet corn is the only vegi we order. 4 small pieces as showed in menu, only enough for 1 person. 
Overall, it's nice meet our expectation.

Love their HH 3-6pm.  Wait is only 5 min.   Ordered their #1 BBQ package for two.  Generous portion.   Deliciously marinated Korean prime kalbi, other beef dishes were also great quality meat.  Along with that is Bulgogi Bimbimbop, salad, half off soju and more.  Definitely filled us up with great satisfaction!   Highly recommended!

After reading all the good review on yelp.  We decided to give it a try.  This place serve some good meat, especially love bulgogi.  On top of the good food they also have awsome service. Will be coming back next time in Vegas.

We four girls ordered Gangnam 4ppl menu and it was totally enough for us. We couldnt even finish the starters. Besides, I like the salad too. The meat were good and bulgogi was tasty. (Btw my friend is wondering why dont they play Got7 s music lol hahaha) In a word, good place to go for korean bbq.

Authentic Korean BBQ, nothing compares to it. There was no wait time for the food and it tasted amazing. Had more than enough food and service was great. If you come at certain times theres are 50% deals and its amazing :D highly recommend 5/5 would come again.
Food is delicious, fun atmosphere! Kalbi beef is very good. The noodles came it very hot and were also really good. A ton of flavor in all of the dishes.
