Yum!!   Really good bbq. Great  service and  reasonable  prices!  Coming back!  Feverish with side dishes.
Good food. Nice service. Sucks how the management makes the restaurant open on thanksgiving until 1.

We ordered the galbi, brisket, pork belly, and kobe style beef for kbbq. We enjoyed it all, but the brisket was big pieces where I am accustomed to shorter cut ones. We also ordered the wonton that I would not recommend. They come in decent quantity, but I would try something else. Wings were good and I'd get them again. Lastly, they have an assortment of sauces. I like them, but I still prefer my sesame oil and salt. I also ordered green tea to expect fresh green tea, but got a canned version that wasn't too bad either.
Best Asian bbq in Las Vegas.we been here many time.our family is very happy with the food and service
Omg best value in happy hour and nice service!! We had a group of five and our happy hour bill was under a bill and we had a huge table of food!! So yummy!!
Nice little clean cute place with cool music & the portions are huge enough for way more than 2 ppl

Miso steak is AMAZING! It's marinaded in a sweet honey soy. To die for. Also try their Macaroon Ice Cream in Green tea soooo good! This a great place parties because it fun to get to cook your food. They have serval tvs as well so that you can watch the game of you like. I would come back!!! Service was also great!!

Try the sangria and yuzu shoju drink both wonderful!!
Decent prices good food. The flat iron steak flavor was a little off putting but everything else very good! Time for dessert!
The coolest restaurant in Las Vegas. Perfect atmosphere, food and service. And discount for UNLV students!!!!(10%)

is good for dinner，recommend unmarinate short rib
Open till 1 am， which is good for eating after gambling
may attend here again

Good service! Nice food!
My friend and I waited in line for half an hour so we were going to be late for the show we booked. They arranged our order and set the table right away.

Great food for a decent and great price! We got the gangnam combo with 5 different types of meat,  oysters,  salad,  mushrooms,  miso soup. They don't even skip out on the banchan which was also really good! I as well got the mul nangmyun which had huge portions.  I would come back here when I visit las Vegas!
Great food. Perfect for hanging out. Even ran into an old buddy from my military days in Korea!

Maybe the best KBBQ I have had in the States (for my taste). I like the sweetness of the marinades and when it hits the grill it gets really good!  We had the Korean Chicken (wife's fave) Korean Prime Kalbi (my favorite) and the Spicy Pork ( loved it too). I'm a sucker for shishito peppers and we had a pancake.   The spicy tuna kimbap was unexpected and wonderful. 

Good thing this place isn't near home. 

Everyone raved about the friendliness as well and it didn't disappoint. 

Thanks Gagnam

The food taste better than most of more expensive korean restaurants ive been to. 
You do have to wait 15-20min during dinner time but the servers work fast and visit quiet often.
One thing I care alot about eating out at restaurants is bathroom cleanliness. Gangnam's bathroom is clean.
Would defonitely be back when i come back to vegas and would recommend to friends and family.

One thing I would recommend to them would be to improve their sound system for the background music. Its so bad it almost hurts my ears.
This place is Ahh-mazing!! Great service and even better food. It's close to the strip so both locals and tourist can enjoy. Don't forget to get the Macarons they were delicious.

I love food... I love KBBQ. We found this place on Yelp, and we're in love with it. Great food. Great prices. Great service.

If you need KBBQ when you're in Vegas, this is the spot. Although it is a bit off of the strip, it is so worth it. We used lfyt to get here, and it was only about $10 from our hotel room. We were considering going to a restaurant on the strip just so we didn't have to pay for lyft but this was definitely worth it! The food was delicious, I especially loved the spicy tuna dish! It was amazing! The bulgogi and the spicy chicken were tied for second place in my book.

This place is very clean and food's delicious. Definitely coming back when I come to Vegas! What an amazing restaurant!

Ordered Harami Miso, Korean Prime Kalbi, Bulgogi, and Spicy Chicken with lemon sauce. The Kalbi was my favorite. 

Service is a tad slow and frustrating because there are only 4 tables being waited on. 

Restaurant's ambiance is lovely.
The cuts are bigger than we're used to. But it was still delicious! The uni bimbimbap was bomb dot com! The tongue and kalbi was good too!

I came to Vegas with my girlfriend and came across this wonderful bbq place, definitely recommend the gangnam bbq set and the bacon with scallop, we barely finish the set...........and then we did ~delicious!

First time eating here! We ordered the Premium Grill plus beef toro and Bulgogi! Delicious meat selection....coming from LA and having some of the best Korean BBQ this stacks up to the best in LA! Service was great and will return on the next visit to Vegas!
This bbq was amazing, incredible ingredients, wonderful staff, bountiful drinks and over all an amazing place. Thank you!

This is a good restaurant!!!
Good staff and also delicious food!!!
It seems like real Korean food!
While I stayed in hard rock hotel, I went to here twice

This was my first time here, and it was so good! We ordered the beef toro, the spicy chicken with lemon sauce, bacon wrapped asparagus, zucchini and sweet onion to put on the grill. It was bomb. We also ordered the kimchi soup. Loved it. Great friendly service, hot waiter. Sounds good to me :)

Free dessert with review but 5 star is fairly earned and well deserved. Great service albeit slow on meat service but we got compensated for waiting too long on steamed eggs. Servers are easy to talk to and very helpful, some are great eye candies!
Great food, great service! We ordered the gangnan combo, satisfied about the quality and taste. Highly recommend to your guys. It is a must try in Vegas!

If you love Asian BBQ this is the place to come, everything is so delicious and fresh, you can cook the food right in front of you, very reasonable prices and the happy menu is un-beatable!!!! This is my first time trying the chicken karage, if you like fried chicken it's almost similar but with a lightly seasoned breading. The service is amazing and everyone is very friendly, a great atmosphere to eat, have a couple drinks, listen to music and have a great experience, we will definitely be back again!!
Excellent quality and experience. Great atmosphere and a variety of side dishes!! The customer service is really nice too. Definitely coming back.
Best bbq place ,highly recommended! !! The meat lovers is good and the kobe beef carparcio melts in your mouth ...................
The beef bogogi is delicious!!!! The service was good even though there was only two servers. They did try their best to accompdate ten people
Amazing food and amazing service! The food is of great quality! We will definitely stop by again whenever we visit Las Vegas.
Really good Korean BBQ. The bulgogi was the best. Also the spicy lemon chicken was very tasty! Highly recommended.

Excellent cuisine! I would recommend it to everyone! They have a great choice of meat. All of the items on the menu are delicious and fresh! Their service is excellent and very accurate. Definitely coming back here!

Really great service and high quality meats. Came here with 2 gfs and we were so full that we didn't eat the dumplings. The miso soup was a bit salty but I was surprised to see that there was quite a few small tofu pieces. Other places usually don't have tofu in their miso soup. 

We ordered the meat lovers ($55.95) which is supposed to be good for 2 people. It came with 6 different meats. I wasn't a huge fan of the bulgogi but the filet was amazing. It literally melted in my mouth! If I come back, I'll just order the filet. 

Side dishes were ok, nothing special. I wish they gave radish slices instead of tiny pieces of radish though.

went here last night after the fiance got in and it was pretty good. I was surprised though that our bill still came out to $50. I thought everything had a lot of taste and the staff was very nice. 

We got the following:

House salad - good size for the price
Squid - about 5 pieces for $6 but it was good
Kalbi - We got hte $8 kalbi meat which was like 6 small pieces so i felt that could have been a bit bigger cuts
Bi Bim Bap - $10 - big portion and bf said it was good
Also got a couple of veggies - mushroom melody and peppers - both were good as well. 

overall not bad if you are not looking for AYCE.

Server (Dave) was really nice and explained to us the portions before ordering.  We ordered the meat lover for 4 people and we had a lot of left overs with 5 people eating. Dave was honest and all the waiters/waitresses helped one another with their tables.  Great service and food.  Don't forget to leave a review for free ice cream

I recommend this place to anyone that is into Asian Cusine! The meat was very fine and tender. No complaints whatsoever! The happy hour was great! $4 for meat!! Amazing!! If you are in Las Vegas i definetely recommend it!!
Amazing place for Korean bbq! Everything is fresh, great service, and fun experience. Will definitely be coming back.

I came here on a friday night so maybe that's why it was not so packed. The food came out fast and the quality was pretty good. The portion seemed small but it was actually very filling. We had 2 ppl but could only finish more than half of the combo. Overall, a good place for korean bbq.

The food here was fantastic but what took it from a 10/10 to the next level is the service. I want to give a huge thank you to Beck, Ashley and Andrew. Each of them was very personable, fun and added laughter and wonderful memories to our evening. I will definitely go back next time I visit and will recommend this restaurant to anyone that visits. Thanks again for a spectacular evening.
Awesome food. I had the kimchi bibimbap, definitely a must-try! The atmosphere is friendly and the staff are nice!!
Love this place! The beef marinade is so delicious! Bacon wrapped salmon is great with the sauce too. I love coming here!

Place is pretty hip. It is a KBQQ joint, and they sell their meats tapas style. I'd suggest to order their korean prime kalbi, brisket, premium beef tongue, kobe style beef, spicy pork, and their filet mignon for meats. They also offer happy hour in which some of the dishes come at a discount that ranges from $2.95-9.95 per tapa order depending on the meats. 

Mixxed veggies are a good choice for sides, kimchee, japanese pepper, mushroom, and asparagus. The stuff with the cheese sides aren't really worth it. I wasn't too fond of the whole cheese dipping thing, and didn't end up using it. 

For the combos, the first time we came, we ordered the Paradise combo. It says it's good for two people, but we split this with a family of four. We don't eat a lot, but it was still enough to fill us up! Well, we also ordered calamari (which was also good! especially their sauce!) and their fried dumplings (beware. it's really spicy).

This place is pretty hip, they also have a nice private room for a big party. They feature this big projector screen that plays a mixture of popular music videos from here and Korea. The Korean music videos are so fun to watch even if I don't understand the language. It's a good way to help the time pass. 

It's a fun hip place to go to, but every time I go it's barely full. Maybe one or two areas are taken.
Great!! Food, Great Service!!!  Will definitely come again.  Ordered the Las Vegas for 2.  Got our money's worth.
Good food, great service, nice atmosphere, and good value for the quality of the melt-in-your mouth, delicious, marinated beef and pork.  I recommend the Gangnam meal with bulgogi bibimbap.
Absolutely amazing! Order the Kobe beef it's so good. Definitely a must when visiting Vegas!
Great place to for Korean BBQ !!! The service and food quality are the best !! Try the sangria !!

Came here entirely because of the quantity and quality of the Yelp reviews. Turns out they offer free ice cream dessert if you write a review while at the place. That not withstanding, this Korean BBQ joint is great for lunch: one meat, rice, salad or soup, one side (dumplings, edamame), and a load of toppings and sauces for $9.95. You cook the meat yourself at the table. Overall, lunch was really good, and the high rating is real. We ended up getting desert, but not the one offered free for this review.

Good portions sizes and the meat quality was good.  It's not L.A. Kbbq but it has its own flair.  Service was good even though we were a party of 11.  The only shortcomming was that the sides needed some work.

Delicious banchan. High quality meat and cheap prices for the quality.  We ordered the fried calamari, pork belly, beef toro, and bulgogi and loved all of it. I definitely recommend this place, especially for happy hour.
Awesome food. A must for when in Vegas. Top notch... Soju was so good get the green apple. Happy hour was a great touch. Will be back for sure
This place was truly an oasis in the desert. The bbq was so flavorful! The servers were really nice and patient. I would come back again!
we ordered the Gangnam combo for 6, awesome and huge portions for 8 people! thumbs up !

The wait time was ridiculous, we called ahead and were told that by the time we got there our wait time should be no longer than 40 mins and that she would write our name down for a table... When we got there she told us we were next to get a table so it would probably be 30 minutes or less. We had a party of 11 and we told them that we wouldn't mind splitting our table but they said to just wait for the table in the back. It's understandable that you can't control how long a customer takes but 2 hours later, we're still waiting and are watching for the table the reserved for us. By the time the family that had finished at that table, only one waiter came in to go clean it.. And he didn't even finish cleaning.. It wasn't until another 15 mins later the others realized they needed to finish cleaning it, lol. 

The food came out quickly so it wasn't that bad, but we didn't get our appetizers until after all our food came out.. And the waiter didn't seem really happy and looked mad the whole time, when we asked for somethings he would miss it until we reminded him a couple times. It doesn't kill to fake a smile at the least... They didn't really check on us as much either, we needed a new grill and had to wait until nearly the end as we were finishing our food for it to be replaced.

But overall, the food was good, I'd give it 4 stars if the service was much better. We ordered the gangnam and Las Vegas pack, they were both filling and the cream cheese wonton appetizers were so good! Made me want more. 

Overall I would come back next time, but with a smaller party or splitted party lol

So came here for Lunch on a Saturday. Food was okay. However, the service was absolutely horrendous.  They weren't very busy at all. It took 45 minutes to bring out our beef toro and we asked about it twice, and they said the kitchen is still slicing it. We ordered combo fried rice and specifically said only chicken and beef. They brought it out with shrimp too, and when we told them, our sever said he'll just take out the shrimp for us. Umm.. No.. The rice tastes like shrimp now. Overall service was horrible, has to request more water 3 times, request for the grill to be changed, request for my check after waiting 15 minutes.

The reviews on YELP are totally FAKE because they offer a free dessert if you review them. No body is going to show them a 1 star review to get a dessert.

Definitely do not recommend.
This is my 1st time here and I love it! It is a nice environment and have friendly service. I will definitely next time I come back to Vegas!

This place was recommended by a friend, and did not disappoint. I've never been to Korean bbq, and the waiter thoroughly explained how the menu worked and what the tastiest items were. There was so much food and everything was delicious. I will be back next time in vegas

Came here with a group of friends and ordered the Gangnam combo for 8 people. There was so much food that I was eating leftovers for the next 2 meals! The quality of the meat was really good though, and they even had oysters and carpaccio which I really enjoyed. Overall I felt like the price was worth it!

I've been  to different  Korean restaurant  and so far this is the best one . it's  fast service nice costumer service and I like the presentation . Nice ambiance  highly recommended to my friends and family.
this restaurant is really good and the appetizer is also very delicious! Recommend to come and try

Phenomenal service, top quality meats, and our server happily provided white glove service and minded our meats on the grill the entire time. Spectacular. Very good oysters too. Yum. I am coming back. It's reminiscent of high end Korean BBQ. I don't think I could do just any Korean BBQ again after this wonderful experience. 
Excellent service. Thank you.

Brought my sis and best friend here for the first time, they have never done a Korean BBQ and they loved it!!!  Can't wait to be back!!! So good food service and price! I think it's the only Korean BBQ in vegas I would go to...just right benone the strip!

This place is really good, have large portions and the meat (for our meat lovers meal) is plenty. I liked it since the miso soup in the beginning and it was good through out. We also got the seafood pancake and that was great, but tooo much food, we had to do take home on a lot of the meat. Would come back.

Wow, this place has many exciting offerings.  We tried several things on this trip and some were standouts.  The Dynamite shrimp and Spicy tuna kimbap were our favorite appetizers. Spicy garlic edamame was also good. Our favorite proteins were Harami Miso and Korean Prime Kalbi. Calamari garlic was just ok, not very garlicky.  Broccoli was good, but the cheese fondue was hopelessly separated(tasty though).  To finish it off the Banana tempura was fantastic, choose the green tea ice cream with it. Probably our favorite dessert of our vacation , and it was free for writing this review at the table. The meal came with several welcome extra tastes like Kim chee, sprouted beans etc. We would love to return.

One word - YUM!!!! The Kobe beef carpaccio is a must order. It's probably the best I've had. My group ordered 2 orders and wanted more! This place is definitely worth a stop if your in the Vegas area!

Very attentive staff. Amazing food.
Yummy food I love it. It's almost as good as eating a slice of heaven.
We were able to get a private room to eat for our family, which was a please surprise. Food was served fast / service was great! Will come back again .
Very good food for the price. Definitely a place to check out if you are on the strip. Frequent Korean BBQ visitor and I'm very pleased with their selection of food.
Great service, delicious food, and all at a good price, highly recommend!! We got the bbq meats, bibimbap, and dessert and all was so so good!!

Really enjoyed the visit here! Got the meat lover combo for 6 and everyone of us came out absolutely stuffed! Our favorite was the filet mignon cut! Super tender and flavorful! Its a pretty good deal for $140 for the 6 of us...definitely worth trying!
First Korean yakiniku spot that we hit up and it's an easy 10/10!!! Quality meat and service that will most definitely put you to sleep.  Coming back, with friends, is most definitely happening.

First time here.... ordered through Gangnam prix fix menu for 2. Excellent quality and value for the price.  Favs were Haram Miso, Prime Kalbi, and Filet Mignon.  Also comes with fresh oysters, fried calimari and all the Korean side fixings. Can't wait to come again to try the Premium package!
The food was great it just hit right on the spot ;) the best korean spot thank you so much
Everything is amazing! Order the mushroom medley for sure hands the spicy pork BBQ. Great happy hour 3 to 6.
High quality meat at an affordable price! The meat is nicely marinated. Really can't beat this place. A bit off the Strip but totally worth it!
Lots of food...good for price. Way better than ayce places. 4 people and we shared a dinner for 2. If you write a review you get a free dessert. :-) we will be back.

Pros:
   Easy parking
   Good service
   Usually no wait
   Soju beer and wine
   Good meats
   Nice smaller portion plates and lesser prices
   Nice ventilation

Cons:
   None

What an amazing place!!!.  You cook Korean food at the table.   They have a wide selection of meats marinated that are simple to cook.  I loved the sides that we received.  

One of the funniest expertise on this trip.  Skip a buffet and come play with your food.

Get the steamed mushrooms.  I like mushrooms but this open me to some new mushroom flavored I did not know.
Great Korean BBQ , everything taste great! Will definitely come again. Long drive coming from Riverside Ca......

MUST MUST MUST FOR KBBQ! I was with four girls (and we can EAT) and we shared the Gangnam. It was a lot, it was able to be taken to go and it fed us again. The meats were not overly salty, very fresh. Kimchi was fantastic. My favorite part was the bimbimbap. The staff was all weirdly attractive and very accommodating. Best KBBQ place I've ever had.

First time here, and I quite enjoyed it. Came here with a group of friends and shared the Meat Lovers for 4. There was more than enough food and they were cool about substituting one of the appetizers for another. We shared the meal between 2 girls and two pretty big guys. We all finished satisfied. The table we sat at had two grills which worked great for keeping one of them pork free. The service was above average with a good amount of visits from the servers. It's fun diy night out with friends.
This is one of the best BBQ I have ever tried. The food is delicious and it is not expensive. PLZ try Uni Bibibamp!
Nice experience..if you don't like spicy ask for assistance choosing your dishes. The beef was wonderful. The service was a bit slow even though the place was fairly empty
Good meat options for the price. I really enjoyed the spicy chicken and the iron side steak. Super fun and a great time.
My first time  here try their happy hour menu. Awesome! Great food! No regret! Huge portion. Highy recommended. Friendly employees. Love the ambiance. Excellent!

First time trying Korean bbq and it was really good. A little pricey, but you get a lot of food. We had a group of 6 and were fine with a meat lover combo for 2 ($55.95) and a couple other sides. The wait staff was very attentive and patient considering we took awhile to figure out what we wanted.

We had a party of 7 on a Friday night and were seated pretty quickly.  Food and service was good.  The shrimp bibimbap was lacking though.  I am used to my bibimbap having an egg and lots of veggies but this particular one mostly came with rice and shrimp.  The side dishes were plentiful and yummy!
We got the Gangnam grill set and it was so filling! Would definitely recommend if you're looking for a delicious meal at an an affordable price.  Service is A+
Great bbq. The oysters left something to be desired. The korean waitresses do not cook the meat for you but they mix the bimbimbap.

We came here for the happy hour appetizers. It's a pretty solid kbbq joint. The service is good, the food is excellent, and the atmosphere is very chill. I brought my family here along with my 1 year old, it is very kid friendly. Don't forget to save room for the macaroon ice cream sandwich!

Absolutely awesome!!! Never tried Korean BBQ like this before. First you order from a bunch of delicious choices of apps, sides, and meats. Then they bring all of it to your table. Then you get to cook your meat of choice at your table in front of you!

Its basically like chocolate for men. Try it. You wont be disappointed. Great food and great service.

Try the kobe and the garlic steak stuff!

I highly recommend this place. The food was really good and the service excellent. We ordered the Gangnam meal for 2, but it fed 4 people nicely (although you probably want to try some other things too). It gives you a sample of many different meats. Plus, if you write a review, you get a free desert! The price is a little on the higher end, but definitely worth it.

highly recommend this restutant because of the nice service，I love the miso soup.
The beef and spicy pork is great！！！
A little pricey since it's in a tourist-frequented area but it's really good food. They marinate all the meat which makes it more flavorful than some other Korean BBQ places.

We're from the Bay Area and we've had some GREAT kbbq, but me and mom have to give this place applause. The service is just as good as the food as well. 
Recommendation: Beef Carpacio for appetizer and Short Rib

The best Korean BBQ place I've ever been. Their complimentary side dishes are great to start with. We ordered seaweed salad, chicken karate and Calamari as appetizers and they are awesome. All the meat and veggies are great. Bulgogi is a must try.
Fooood was delicious! Tapa style was definitely worth the prices. Will come back again! (:
Super good!! They have everything for real Korean BBQ. Highly recommend even for Korean! Best Korean bbq ever! Omg I love it (for Korean_ their Kimchi is just like my mom's one. Taste amazing!!)

Maybe because I live in NoVA and we have a slew of great Korean BBQ. My gripe with this place is not the food per se. It can be considered above average. I think we ordered the premium combo with a few a la carte.  I can't remember what meat was what, but I can tell you that some were good and some were ok. The biggest problem with this place is service. 

The only time they stopped off at our table is to take our order, drop off the food, and give us the check. Never came by to pick up empty plates. Had to scream at them to get their attention for ordering more drinks and water. Never came to refill the side dishes. Never checked on our sauce. You get the picture. They didn't even pretend to care and help start cooking.
The atmosphere is very soothing and comfortable while enjoying the quality food and speedy service. Definitely will be eating here again!
First time eating here and I enjoyed the experience. Our server Jin was super nice and took us step by step in the process. Recommend it! Loved everything.

Loved the food..the happy hour specials are worth it....loved the ambience and service too..we got seated as we entered and our server was very patient with explaining the cuts and the seasoning..will definitely visit this place again when in vegas..

Great spot to get small bites since everything is a la carte. It adds up though. Ambiance is nice and reminds me of Gyu Kaku. The menu style is also similar to Gyu Kaku. 

Meats rated from 1-5
Premium tongue: 5
Filet mignon: 5
Prime kalbi: 5
Marinated kalbi: 3.5, it's quite fatty 
Harami miso: 5
Pork belly: 5, oily but so good 
Bulgogi bibimbap: 4.5, I like the rice crispy so you have to let it sit for a long while 
Ttebokki: 4, it's spicy ! 
Fried dumplings: 5, I didn't get to try it but the boyfriend said it had good substance inside 

I would recommend this spot for people who like Gyu Kaku and a la carte items... Otherwise stick to ayce because they charge for literally everything.

Pretty great!! They offer various quality a la cart menus.
It seems as if they are doing their best to keep foods fresh, authentic (Korean), and to provide best service.
A la cart menus are seasoned in a way non-organic person can enjoy too..less sodium less garlicky.
Meat they depends on cuts. Not the seasoning.
Side dishes in Korean restaurant are always delightful.
We were hungry choose Gang name #1.
It has 5kinds of good cut meats, miso, rice more than items of side dishes,and plenty of salad.
Not buffet but more than what you can eat.
I give 5 stars!!!

Loved it.  We came with a group of business associates after a trade show.  We were starving and wanted plenty of food. 
This place gets rave reviews from me because it's not in the strip (so very easy to get to), as its in a strip mall.

This place is the real deal, you self-cook your meats on your hibachi table and eat it as it comes off the grill. 

We chose a meat lovers dinner for 2 which featured bulkogi, kalbi(ribs), thin sliced ribeye, pork belly(unsmoked bacon) and spicy pork. 

This also came with 10 side dishes, rice and 2 kinds of salad. SO MUCH FOOD!!

This place is as good as value as you'll find in Las Vegas.  Strongly recommend!!!

Great service and food!

Nice place to go with family or friends. Food came out fast grill was at the perfect temp and we had a blast coming together!!

Can't wait to come back!

Awesome Korean BBQ! Service was great and the food was delicious! Nice atmosphere, and over all a great place! They give a free dessert if you write a review! 
Only down side is the wait was quite long on a Thursday night at 7pm, but that's cause it's so good I guess! Come early...!

Happy hour rocks! 50% off! I had Bulgogi, Beef Toro, pork belly, and chicken karaage. The bacon wrapped asparagus is excellent too. It was accompanied by the kimchi apps. I also had a ginger soju cocktail for $3.75. Love it. They are very busy so be patient and kind, you'll get the best service. 

Great place to have what your heart desires, Gangnam brings the best of Japanese soups. Pork Toro, and sausages with Korean BBQ, bibimbap, and Chigae. If you don't know those words, you have to try it. Order 4 BBQ items and get the complimentary side dishes. Also, to complete the fabulous fare, order soju with lemon. Free dessert if you rate them on Yelp. :)

A bit pricey and as with many Korean establishments in Vegas the service can be spotty. However, the cuts and general offerings are solid though they could give more portions considering the ala carte pricing (no AYCE option). Side dishes are nice too but it's quite jarring to see that they charge for free banjan like sauces, lettuce and rice.

Tried this place for the first time after seeing it every time i drove to work, and so happy that I did. It was either Gangnam or Tofu Hut - this place blows Tofu Hut out of the water! So clean, great central location, hip atmosphere -- this is my new go-to spot for Korean BBQ. Mind you, this place is not all you can eat, but the plates of diff meats are decently priced. At approx 6-8 dollars, the portions they give you are very fair. 

For every yelp review, they offer you a free dessert of your choice. 

Try the salmon carpaccio and the dynamite shrimp (a bit spicy), but you def won't be sorry! 

They also give you free complimentary sides of various things: Mac salad, fish, spicy cucumber, Kim chi, etc. 

We most definitely will be back!

Just had to add: have the macaroons! They are delicious. I had the mango and green tea and my GF had the vanilla. (She said that the lava cake was not very good though--we waited quite some time and they offered us a free dessert of our choosing). 

Great place and food! Great staff! Great service!
Easily one of my favorite Korean restaurants ever, and as my partner and I are particular affecionados, we've been to a LOT.  So tasty, so friendly.  A word of warning: the original bibambap is HUGE!

Good pricing on thier lunch special. 12.95 for two meats, soup or salad, and an appetizer. Since its a Korean place you get free side dishes: cucumbers, fish cakes, bean sprouts, kimchi, and squid marinated. Great customer service, David went above and beyond to make sure we had enough food and know how to cook the meats. The kobe was super tender and the bulgogi was flavorful.

Fresh oyster ! Great salad, we tried set for 2 .  High quality food and my kids enjoyed Ramen! 

We are so excited to be able to try genuine Korean Food here in Vegas.

Great atmosphere and friendly service, too. Can't wait to come again.

meat- very tasty!
service- impeccable
restaurant and its vibe- definetly on point!


ive had korean bbq and this is the bomb!

Got the prime combo meal for two. Came with much more than expected, all delicious. Service is great & comes often. Recommend coming for happy hour, 3-6 & 10-1, 50% off all drinks. Good stuff, more than enough for two.

I have tried many Korean BBQ places and I have to say this restaurant stands out the most! I have heard so many good things about Gangnam Asian BBQ and finally gave it a try tonight. The ambiance of the interior was really intimate and it was very clean. It really sets the mood for dates or whenever you're in the mood for binge eating KBBQ with your friends, which is what I did. 

The food was delicious! The meats were served fresh and presented nicely. What came to my surprise was that they served Thai Tea, which made my visit even more satisfying. We ordered the miso soup, pork belly, prime kalbi, bugolgi, the bacon wrapped enoki just to name a few and Yuuum! Belly was satisfied! What adds variety of flavor to your meat is the three different sauces they present you with. There is a vinegar like sauce, a sweet sauce, and a spicy sauce, which really gives you multiple choice on flavorings for your food.Of course trying their desserts was a must so I went for the banana tempura. This was so goood. The banana tempura was served hot off the frying pan and what helped balanced that out was the vanilla ice cream. It was a great ending to my meal. The prices overall are perfect for what they serve you.

All in all I have to say my visit was great! The owner even came out and checked on us. He was so friendly and he looked happy to see his customers. I will be coming back for more!

My first visits to Gangnam Asian BBQ dining. The place is easily accessible and the Korean food is authentic. Highly recommended for the Las Vegas set meal and also like the spicy seafood noodles. Highly recommended!!!

Stopped here on our way to the airport. It was the best food we had all week! Considering we had paid $125 each for one mediocre meal, getting great food here for $25 for the both of us was awesome. We started with the tuna kimbap and both had the spicy ramen. The Kimbap was outstanding and the ramen was perfect. And the dried squid!!!! Amazing
We love it here!! The marinades make the dishes stand out from other BBQ places. Definitely gotta try the Garlic Flatiron Beef and the garlic shrimp!!
Pretty good for Korean BBQ place. Good service (5 stars). Food was good, just wish they offered more side dishes.
Very fast service, solid selection of meats to grill.  Really enjoyed the kalbi and pork cheek
Great food and service! Will return when in Las Vegas. Close to the strip and nice to get away from hustle and bustle.
Best Korean food in Las Vegas! High quality meats! So many options and so delicious!!!!! Yummmmm!!!!!!!
We two ordered "meat lover" set ,and the beef and side dishes were very delicious. A must-eat restaurant in Vegas.

This place has the best Asian BBQ in Vegas
This place has the best Ramen.  It used to have better prices when it first opened.

Maybe it's because I'm use to Dallas Korean bbq restaurants. But this one is pretty good, I think it's funny they charge for dipping sauce, but hustling is the name of the game in any business. I would go back again if I was in Vegas.

Really awesome place. It is my first time in Vegas  and we saw the the reviews and knew we had to try it. The meat lovers for 2 was amazing. The service was exceptional. 100% would recommend to anyone that is looming for an awesome dinner.

Had the premium combo BBQ. Starters in the combo were good, loved the Kobe beef carpaccio and tuna poki. Also ordered a steamed egg appt, really not that good. Egg is way too solid and over cooked. BBQ meats were overall good quality. Kobe beef was my favorite. 

Wait time was 30-45 mins with 3 groups of 2-3 ppl ahead of us.

Servers were all very nice. 

Good experience overall.

The place is well decorated and crowded even at late hours. Beef tongue is my favorite, Korean beef kalbi is also great. 

However, the plate is small, around 4 pieces per plate. So for more than 3 people, you might consider ordering 10+ plates.
The bulgogi was amazing! The price was pretty good for the amount of food that was served. The music selection would entertain any customer that walked in.
Service is great!  Can't wait for lunch! Neat ambiance.  Music videos playing on the wall, cracks me up.

This Korean BBQ hit the spot. Great service and delicious food. We called In a Reservation the night prior since  we had a big party. Next day we called them to let them know we'd be running a little late  they kindly held our table for us. 

Not AYCE but the quality is great. The sides were complimentary if you order two meats per person. Overall great experience.
Awesome!!! Full me= happy me. Must try if you are coming to Vegas! Really good deal for a lot of food
Didn't live up to the hype. Slow service. Long wait. Nothing we got tasted great. Bathrooms were disgusting. Host was also a waiter so that really slowed things down
Arguably the best Korean BBQ I've ever eaten!! Amazing food and great service, would definitely recommend to anyone who enjoys Asian style bbq meals.
This is my first experience with bbq at GangNam Asian bbq.  Foods are good, but portion is kind of small.  However, this is a good one in Las Vegas area.
Great food and excellent service! I especially love their tteokbokki and bulgogi. Plus, what can go better with a good ambiance and free dessert? Worth going back to when we visit Las Vegas again.
It's lit. Macaron ice cream sandwiches be poppin. It super lit and they play bomb music.

The food here was amazing. We ordered the Las Vegas platter for 4 and there was a ton of food. For 4 adults it is a really good amount. Make sure you come hungry. I also recommend the bulgogi bibimbap. It was so tasty. Really, there was nothing we did not enjoy. The sides were good and plentiful and the meats were seasoned very well. The only thing we regret is not being able to finish it all because we got so full.

Great food and great service.  The steamed egg is so fluffy it's almost soufflé-like.  The Korean prime kalbi is also very well marinated and the quality of meat is excellent.  Lastly but no less important is the service.  We didn't come on a very busy night, but the waiters were very quick to remove dishes from our table and refill our beverages.  This makes for an overall great dining experience!

Went here at random because of the good reviews. They weren't lying! We had Jayoung as our waitress, and she was attentive and extremely helpful. We were new to the cook your own style, so she helped us know when the meat was done.

Everything we had tasted awesome, and it wasn't as expensive as other restaurants in the area either. If we are ever in Las Vegas again, I want to come back here.
If you visit las vegas and want to try real korean food. This is the place that you would want to visit during your vacation. Dont forget to try macaron icecream
The service was amazing  the Korean Prime beef  was Great.... Next time I'll have Seafood PS go follow me on Instagram and snap chat @kingpkmoney@sapphiremonet

Simply the best Korean bbq in Vegas! You have many choices for banchan (side dishes). Many assortment of meats and a fish choice which is salmon. 

Appetizers are plenty, from dumplings to tempura. 
You need soup, there is 6 different choices.

Soup not your thing, maybe you can try some bibimbap , so good.

Don't know what to eat, they offer you meal sets for two, four different choices.

Prices are fair and you better come hungry. 
Oh, and don't eat too much banchan, do you can reserve your tummy for the good stuff.

Also, they have free wifi.
It's kid friendly. 
Great staff
Fair price 
Clean establishment 
Air conditioned
Great happy hour menu

Overall,  the best Asian meal that I've had in Vegas..

They had large portions but based on the previous reviews, I had high expectations.  The meat was average and do not provide the high level of quality that I have come to expect from Los Angeles K-town Korean BBQ restaurants.  They don't have to constantly attend to a table, but we literally had all courses in a meal when we bought the combo brought out within 10 minutes then the servers never returned.  I had to get up multiple times to ask for anything such as napkins, more drinks, etc.  I left full based on the quantity but was expecting the quality to be better. I guess I should've known when their ban-chan (korean side dishes) tasted average at best.
Reviewing this to get free ice cream. Portion size is awesome. Corona served with lime....amazing. You can even substitute the meats for different meats in the combo meals, yay.
First time trying kbbq in Vegas and it's so good. Their hirami miso is so tender. They brought out the food pretty quickly. Our server is attentive as well. Will definitely come back!

delicious food, fast service. we ordered the four person gangnam BBQ special which probably had enough food for 6. the meat was high quality and very tender. will return for sure next time I'm in vegas

If al the KBBQ places I've visited, the customer service here is the best yet... We didn't have to ask for anything bc they brought everything out timely... As we know customer service is not really prevalent with KBBQ. Meats were tender and not overly salty. We had the gangnam dinner and it was a great assortment of tastiness. Only downside is the lettuce is not a part of the meal and we had to order in addition to...
I came with my family. Huge portions, food was tasty. Will come back again! I like the music video wall :)
午餐特供非常适合，可以点三个餐组成套餐。住在hard rock一定不能错过。Suggest for the Chinese people who want to try the bbq in.LV.
This place is fantastic.  We ordered the Premium cuts for the table and I am in heaven.  I've been to korean bbq in several places around the U.S.  and this place is easily the best.

My friend and I ordered "meet lover" combo, which was great! If you had too much American and French food in Las Vegas, this restaurant is definitely a good place to take something different! Reasonable price, not big but nice place and good service. Recommended!
Best Korean food in town! Kimchi is so good. Excellent food and staff. Try the bulgogi.

Best Korean BBQ hands down. Really friendly staff and a trendy atmosphere. Really good quality meats and all side dishes were very fresh! Miso paste soup was to die for. The menu is huge with a really nice selection. I love that you can order a al carte style. If ever in the mood for Korean I'll definitely come back.
Awesome foooood!!! Everything tastes amazing and is wonderfully prepared. Will definitely be coming back.

This restaurant look better and taste better than it says in Yelp. I wish they have little bigger space to have more rooms.  The decor is very modern and the vibe is great, good enough to accommodate various age groups. Food was prepared clean and professional manner and the server (her name is Jay) provided the excellent service. I will definitely come back again.

Our first time visiting this place, upon entering the place I was impressed with the decor. Really classy. Service is quick, they brought us side dishes and they were yummy. Price is not bad. I love koren BBQ and thrilled to found this place. Too bad we aren't live closer to this place, highly recommended!

This place has 4.5 stars from 700+ reviews and it doesn't disappoint! The service is friendly and fast. The restaurant is clean and inviting with fun pop music playing in the background but most importantly the food is SO GOOD!

I highly recommend the Korean Kalbi - for $9 you get a generous portion of high quality, thickly sliced and deliciously seasoned meat. It was so good my girlfriend and I immediately ordered a second plate once we were done. The shishito peppers and mushroom medley were also amazing. Hell, everything we ordered was fresh and delicious and tasted amazing off the grill. Heck even the rice was really good and I'm
Picky about rice so that's saying something.

We also ordered a bottle of soju to share (Jinro Chamisul) and it was the perfect drink to go with the meal.

My only complaint is that they do charge you for the sesame oil which is usually free in most korean BBQ places. But for the amazing prize, potions and quality of food who is complaining?

I would fly back to Vegas just to eat here ;) this place definitely was a huge highlight of my Vegas trip.
Great place to dine and good quality meat selection! Definitely a place to visit in Las Vegas.
Food is good quality and the service is good as well. The portions are generous. I would definitely recommend it to others.

I've been there a couple of times and I am truly amazed by the fast service and the quality of the meat.

Atmosphere: I love the decor! The big projector screen is perfect for entertainment. I can eat my food while watching and singing along to music videos. The restaurant  looks very clean.

Service: the staffs are friendly and courteous. They make sure to constantly refill my glass. My server was Kristin and she was amazing! I didn't know how the menu work the first time I was there and she took the time to explain everything.

Food: OHHH MYYY GAWD. no words to describe those succulent  pieces of meat. 


The only reason why I didn't give this place 5 stars is solely because it's not an AYCE BBQ :p
Great service, fresh meats, cute waitors. All around a good experience, but a little pricey which is why I rated 4 instead of 5 stars.
Did the gangdam for 6 but had only 5 people with us thinking it won't be enough. We were wrong it was way too much food!! It was delish!

Was our first time here and I must say we loved it. The staff was very friendly and attentive. The food was delicious our favorite was the spicy pork. Very clean will definitely come again. Our server Jin was amazing and very charming.
There are a few times in life when a meal is so expertly crafted and planned that it is nothing short of genius. Last night was one of those nights at Gangnam Grill

By far the best Korean restaurant I've been to! I'm a big Korean food fanatic and always trying out new restaurants and this is the beta by far. Restaurant closes late which is good thing when you're in Vegas since you start the night around 11 and it's a good stop to heat before drinking. Our server was very nice and attentive. Definitely looking forward to eating here again next time I visit Sin City.

Very nice staff and food.
We've choose Gangnam set. We ate too much lol
I would recommend here.

I decided to give this place a try after seeing many good reviews about it on Yelp. Overall, I like it. Great food and friendly environment here. I love how they have so many kind of macaron ice cream. 
P.S: You get a free macaron ice cream for rating and reviewing them.
Loved it. Get to cook your own food. Will visit next time in Vegas. Got free ice cream with a review posted.

Outstanding Korean BBQ. Many Koreans eat here. Large menu of various food items or order the Las Vegas set for $45.95 or the Meat Lovers set for $55.95. Both are enough for 3 or 4 people or take the leftovers home.
We like meat very much, even the amount per dish is not very much for us. The meat is delicious and the size is just for eat. It is worthy place to go!!^_^
First time here and random to find this place. The service was great but meat was just ok.  The food mostly tasted too sweet. The better thing is get a free dessert if we write the review for them.

Price wise, this place is definitely worth it regarding the quality of the meat. I came to dinner out with two girlfriends and we ordered one package for all 3 of us with fillet mignon, pork belly, brisket, kalbi, spice pork, and all of were delish. The side plates were also super bomb. I will definitely come back here since is close to my school and now is one of my top 5.
Amazing food excellent atmosphere ! Price is reasonable, staff is very friendly.  The wait time for seating ok.  Lots of items to choose from on the menu.
The place is cozy and very nice! I've heard so many good reviews for this place! It is highly recommended! The staffs are friendly
Amazing food, great service, and huge portions. Definitely coming back when I'm next in town.

Normally I go to Korean BBQ restaurants for all-you-can-eat. My friends really wanted to try this place. Even though we could not stuff our faces till we puked, the meat was really great quality. We were able to sample 6 different dishes, all were marinated to perfection. However, I wish there was more quantity. Customer service was alright. It took a while to get our grill changed. There were times where we thought they forgot about us.
Came here on vaca for a quick bite but was i in for a surprise! The food is so good and authentic! And have to mention they got some hot guys who works there!
Great food. Especially liked the spicy pork and kimchi. Great selection of drinks. Next time I am definitely coming for happy hour.

It os our first time in Las Vegas, first night. After more than 6 hours driving, this restaurant has been a wonderful surprise. Look the prices, how the plates look like! I would recommend the Korean prime Kalbi barbecue and the fried calamari! From now: Las Vegas= Gangnam Asian BBQ Dining
very good taste. I got really full when I finished. And they offer free deserts with a good rate on google Yelp.  So you know what to do.

Nice out of the way Korean bbq, it's worth a date night or family dinner, friendly service, quick on delivering the food to table, gam sa hap nee da, gangnam gangnamp ps, salmon wrap in bacon is the bomb
This is a pretty good Korean bbq restaurant. The food and beef are very fresh and good quality.
Excellent food and service! We ordered the Gangnam set dinner and everything was beyond our expectations!
My first time here and love the chicken tender fondue and the pork cheeks! And happy hour for drinks, perfect!

Delicious food! Pretty good service too. But a little expensive considering it wasn't all you can eat. It was my first time at Korean BBQ so I wasn't familiar with all the foods. But I liked almost everything.

The location was understaffed however the food was delicious! 

They have great lunch specials and even offer free desert for a yelp review!

If going during the lunch hours is a great place to save some cash while getting great food.
This is by far the best korean place I've been to here in Vegas! Sue is sooo attentive.. Really good food.. Love this

Didn't expect good kbbq in vegas but this place delivered. 

Was it the best? Nope but it ranks pretty high up there.
I'm from LA & OC and have had a lot of good kbbq so I'm a bit spoiled.

Got the Gangnam combo to try everything.

This place is mediocre and extremely overhyped, and I strongly suspect that a large number of the glowing reviews were written just to get free dessert. I gotta admit I nearly did this myself--it would be awkward to show the server a two-star review when asking for a free dessert, wouldn't it? That's how they getcha.

We ordered the Meat Lover's BBQ for two, which at ~$56 for a single serving of meat, was obscenely overpriced. In cities with good Korean restaurants and more competition, you can get all-you-can-eat BBQ for $20/person. To top it off, the $56 doesn't even get you lettuce wraps, ssamjang, or sesame oil--you have to pay extra for each. Are you kidding me?

The meat itself was good. I mean, it's hard to mess up raw meat. However, the grill was electric! That was a first for me, and yet another disappointment with this restaurant. The meat obviously came out with no grill flavor whatsoever, and I could have cooked it better at home.

Our waitress was nice, and she was very good at topping up our water. However, not once did she offer to refill any of the banchan, so we ended up paying $56 for a single serving of meat AND sides. Lastly, she dropped off the check before we were even done, and I had to make several attempts to flag her down so that we could order dessert. She didn't clear the table for dessert, and we had to awkwardly share it among a bunch of empty dishes and leftover food, hunched over the giant table.

I love this place.

They have the best bibimpap. It is huge and delicious! 

They have great appetizers.

The servers are nice.

They have some BBQ meats a la carte.

I tend to find something I love at a place and always get it over and over again.

It's the bibimpap here.

If I want some pork belly and NOT AYCE KBBQ then this is where I come.
This place is great. I brought many friends here. It's a lot of food so come hungry! All the sides are delicious.

Wow...like wow...

We were treated to dinner here by a colleague during a recent convention...and wow...

Before we had gotten there, they had already ordered...some type of premium platter that feeds ~6 people...it could have fed 6 villages...

I am not sure if this is all in the platter, but this is what we had...

Salads that were, despite us not wanting to waste any stomach space on salad, we're surprisingly light, well dressed and well balanced--a very nice starter.

8 different kinds of Pan Chan...sprouts, fish cake, delicious cabbage Kim chee, perfectly crunchy cucumber Kim chee, and more..

Hawaiian Poke style ahi tuna--this was good, but there was too much other great stuff

Half shell oysters...probably the only imperfect part of the meal...not much flavor from the oysters or the toppings..

Beer

Kobe beef Carpaccio was a great way to open the main portion of the meal and was probably one of my favorites of all great things we ate

Kobe Style Beef that melts in your mouth like butter...to die for...the best part of the meal

Kal Bi perfectly marinated and as tasty as any Korean BBQ I have had

Beer

Filet mignon cubes...so tender!

Flank steak thinly sliced and delicious..

Beer

Scallops and Shrimp freshly prepared

Ice cream macaroons for dessert...strawberry, coffee, green tea, mango, maybe a few more, but by then, I was so far into food coma heaven, it didn't really matter.

There may have been some other things, but at this point, you either get what I am saying or not...one or two more dishes isn't going to make a difference :-P

Even living in the Bay Area with all the great Korean food, I would be hard-pressed to find a place to top this one...

A resounding 5 stars and I can't wait to go back!

VERY Happy Eating!
Very good Korean food for 45 bucks including free dessert! Even comparable to the Bay Area . Service is top notch and for the amount of food two people cannot finish it. Keep up the good work!
It was an amazing experience. Food was amazing. The server was vary nice a attentive always making sure everything was ok . I will recommend this place to all my friends and family .

We were craving korean BBQ and walked 1.5 miles here to try it out since the place has 4.5 stars and over 800 reviews. 

We reached in time for the Happy Hour and they have a great bbq and appetizer menu. We had jalapeño poppers with salmon (real jalapeño and it had a great kick!), fried calamari, garlic calamari, beef toro, pork belly, korean chicken with fondue, bulgogi and spicy pork and they are all pretty tasty. The price was also reasonable around $2-$4 for the happy hour dishes and around $4-$9  for non happy hour dishes. The servings are also pretty good sized. 

The only down side is that we had to pay for lettuce and miso which is usually free. I would definitely come back here again.

The beefs are very well marinated, the side dishes are free to refill like most Korean Restaurants, and last but not least the servers here are friendly and helpful! Recommended! THERE'S ALSO A GREAT DEAL OF HAPPY HOUR FROM 3pm-6pm!
The bbq food is cheap and delicious! the free sides that come with the meal (kimchi, pickled veggies, tofu) are all yummy! they have Sapporo on draft and lots of sake options! Yum yum

Really clean and friendly environment.
Super busy so call ahead and see how long the wait time is.
Spicy tuna kimbap is a must! My fav item of the night
Enoki with bacon was also really good.
Service is super fast. I deff recommend for anyone craving Korean BBQ!

I love this place!!! We were immediately greeted upon entering and was welcomed into the restaurant. Service was very fast as well. We had happy hour and I tried the beef toro and bulgogi. Both were extremely delicious! Highly recommended kbbq! Amazing!!

This place is tremendous. As someone who has lived in South Korea for a year I can say this restaurant is truly authentic Korean BBQ. The staff is very generous and willing to help in any way. Highly recommended!

First time trying Korean bbq I had the skirt steak, brisket and the bibimbop and I loved it! Everything was fresh and the service was very good! If you're in Vegas you don't want to miss out! I will be bringing my honey and best friend here!
Happy hour is great! The place is clean and the food is delicious. We come here every time we are in Vegas.
Good food and excellent service!  Came in during happy hour so we got half off on our soju bottles ^^ Will be back again whenever I'm back in Vegas!

My sister and I checked this place out a few months ago based on Yelp reviews. We were pretty pleased with the food. Atmosphere was modern and fun as was the décor. Finding great Korean food is a challenge in and of itself but a place with good atmosphere, solid food, and pleasant service always makes for a great evening out. Happy to say that we will definitely be back. Thanks for helping these Korean girls get a little taste of home!
Great food and service! Sides are fantastic! All of the meats are freshly prep. The servers are quick to refill your sides.
Great quality meat! Hidden gem in Vegas! Always enjoy the food especially my favorite Shrimp Bibimbap! Service is great!!
Great foods and great service . Drive 5 hours from AZ. This a great foods to help me recover.

Ever since my family's favorite Asian bbq closed down my family has been looking for another good place. This place is amazing. The food is very good and the service is very nice. I will be coming here again.
Probably the best Korean food in Vegas. We ordered Gangnam set for 4 to feed 5 ppl and can barely finish.the kimchi tofu & bibimbap is extra tasty.
Second time dining and once again blew my mind! Love the bulgogi and garlic edamame! Price is spectacular during happy hour and great customer service! Good vibes all around, love this place

The food & service is good, But they put too much MSG that made me allergy and thirsty. I'm still suffering w/ allergy now.
They have asked us to give them good rate to get free dessert. It's kind of cheating.  I think Yelp should stop them.  If I knew their food were added w/ MSG, then I won't go or try at all.

I am always looking for authentic Korean BBQ places and this spot is my favorite by far! They have so many different options for sides (the steamed egg and ttekbokki are my favorites) as well as a delicious variety of meats. The happy hour is the best with 50% off drinks and discounted food options. Will continue to keep coming back!
Good food, good ambiance. Generous portions and service for the price - great value. Loved the chicken sukiyaki noodles and bibimbap.
Great food, great service! The korean prime kalbi, premium tongue, pork toro and spicy soft tofu are really good. Will be back here for sure;)

First time at a Korean bbq joint like this and was blown away, came at happy hour and filled up on a date night drinks includes on a $30 bill. Food was just amazing. Guarantee anything on the menu is stellar.
This was our first time coming here and we have no regrets! The service was excellent and the food was delicious. I highly recommend you come here. The original bibimbap was awesome.

First time at this restaurant and we really enjoyed the experience. The meats were all delicious as were the scallops and bacon wrapped salmon. The menu is extensive enough for everyone to find something they enjoy. Relaxed atmosphere and friendly staff...highly recommended.
It was good. We had the meat lovers. It was scrumptious! And I am about to enjoy desert! Yum!
First time dining here and it was worth the drive over. Great food, and a LOT of it! Service was excellent and we had fun working the grill. Will definitely come back!

What Was ordered:
Chicken Karaage
Kabocha tempura
Hiramiso Steak 
Korean Prime Kalbi
Fried Dumplings

I went with a group of my friends and we kind of all ordered individual items and shared them. All the items were so good ! Service was great. The side items that came with the meal were super yummy. I want to come back before I leave Vegas.
Last time I was in Vega$, I stopped at Gangnam Asian BBQ with co-workers!  It was SO delicious, we visited twice during the same visit!  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

We went to this place for a dinner at Thanksgiving time. The environment is nice and the food is very tasty, the waiters and waitresses are super friendly. My kids loves the ice-cream cookies. I would definitely visit it next time when I go to LV.

Service was so slow. We had THREE refills on the complimentary dishes before our meats were even served. Got full on kimchi and radish. This place was greatly understaffed. We asked the server where the oysters were from and she wasn't able to tell us the species and only that they were the "typical ones you  buy in market." They ended up tasting very fishy and not fresh. Disappointed. Filled up on calories but not satisfied.

So good suggest you get the premade combinations. They have so much good food! Kind and rapid service. Hold on to your butts! They run a tight ship and have keen business sense. Nothing related to the quality but I think the stereo speakers are blown out or not set right.

Great place! Went for happy hour and they had great options to choose from. HH is every day from 3-6 pm. It includes bulgolgi and brisket for $4. Such a good deal. Stop by here if you're craving good KBBQ in Vegas!

So much food. Definitely worth the value. Everything was excellent!! Will be back! Got the gangnam and the portion was so huge! All of the meat was perfectly tender. Staff was extremely fast and friendly. The oysters are fantastic!

Soooo good!! Our bellies hurt from delicious Korean BBQ. The service is top notch. Everyone is very attentive and friendly. We highly recommend the Gangnam combo. Make sure you come starving! It's well worth it!
Food was great and fresh. Service was a little slow do to the amount of people eating versus the amount of staff

Came here on "cheat day." Really good, we ordered the Gangnam for two, shared it between three people and it was more than enough food. Only reason for four stars is because we felt like there weren't enough vegetables in the combo and ordering veggies for $3-4 didn't feel justifiable. Overall great experience, everyone was super nice and so attentive. We'll definitely be back!!

This is the second time here. The service is excellent friendly and promt. 
 The food is fresh and delicious. Our favorite Vegas restaurant.  I also like the complimentary salads. Table top grills make for  a unique dinning experience.
The best bibimbom ever! I had the gangnan for 2 people! So Satisfying! However, I waited for 2 hrs to get seated;(

Our first time try GangNam asian bbq . For all the meat and soup are delicious. We ordered spicy tuna for recommended starter, for the meat we had bacon scallops, pork toro ,spicy squid , beef tongue,beef toro . They are fresh and tasty . And all the side dish are good too .
This place is wonderful! The food is full of flavor and the service is outstanding! Get the meat lovers on your first visit you can't go wrong.
Fantastic Korean BBQ here. Great ambiance here, with good service. Terrific spot for groups as well. My favorite place to eat in Vegas, by far and away.

Went here for the 3-5 pm happy hour. They have pretty good choices on the menu so we opted for...pretty much everything on it lol. It was delicious. Flavorful and definitely fulfilling. We also ordered fried rice and the sukiyaki noodles that were not on the HH menu. Both were very good, but the noodles were amazing. So rich and they don't short you on the chicken either (in both the noodles and rice). The honey bread dessert was probably the best honey bread I've had. 

My only problem was the service. Our waitress was really rude. We felt rushed when we were trying to order, and while I was still clearly looking at the menu, she asked me to give it back to her. We wanted to order more food but she never came back so decided against it. We waited approximately 15-20 minutes to order dessert and then another 10 for the check. She was doing side work and looking at us but chose not to come over while we sat there waiting. So two other waiters came to help. It was really off-putting. 

Nevertheless, I'll probably be back because the food was delicious. If the bad service continues however, I'm not sure it'll be worth it.
I found this place in Yelp.Everything was delicious!!!!! Good employees! I do like Original Bibimbap!
I love this place, very comfortable environment and very pleasant service. I would recommend the bacon, beef, soup, and dessert.
Best Korean food I've  ever had in America.  10 stars. Very authentic. Seevice fast and friendly.
Very fun cooking over the grill. Loved the zucchini grilled. Kalbe also excellent, as well as brisket.

Great Korean BBQ! Plenty of food for 2 and good quality meat and variety if cuts. RECOMMEND for off the strip Korean dining. Only complaint was oyster dish was too fishy. Overall, great dining choice. Get the Gang Nam special.

Good food, good vibes, & great customer service! I will come back here again. The bulgogi is very good! I really like the kimchi, it flakes the rice. The beef toro is amazing when you dip it in the sauces. 

Happy hour is amazing. You can get meats up to $4 a plate!
Very clean atmosphere and clean food. Very pleased with the service and the food. My fiancée and I will definitely will be back.

Excellent service
Great food, great value, really tasty
We ordered Las Vegas set and it is really valuable!!! Highly recommend
Awesome place!  The meats were delightful, the Kobe beef was amazing, and the Kobe Ssam was awesome! The service was just right . We will be coming back!
It's a new place to me and I'm impressed ! The service is great and the food was delish ! Love the jalapeno poppers with salmon. And the decor is great too , nice to bring ur date to. Super yummy !!
It was great to stumble upon this place. Everything was pretty high quality and they've got lots of variety. Seafood pancake was excellent and well priced. Late night happy hour. Will def be back.
Great food!!!! Glad that we did'nt go to another buffet place. Friendly staff and very goood service. :) we'll definitely go back here next time we come visit vegas. :))

Food was great ! Best in town! Would definitely come again. The beat part is if your with four or five people its really affordable too. And the quality of the food is great too. Very clean place ! Which is important
Meat was good quality; long wait but worth it. Would recommend for Korean BBQ fanatics.
Great place, great atmosphere, great side dishes. I would come again. Try their meet on grill it is pretty good. I did not like to calamari but all other food was good.

Great place. Tried the spicy ramen with Japanese sausage: Like!  Broth was flavorful and warm, appreciated how it didn't burn my tongue. The serving was hearty, would definitely order again. My partner ordered the BBQ lunch special: 1 item $9.99, 2 item $12.95. Hearty serving as it comes with salad, a few sides like kim chee, etc., and rice. Lots of flavor.

Ambience is awesome, there's 2 tv screens, music in the background, loud enough to hear and enjoy. The decor is hip, chill and clean. The workers are professional and friendly, a place you have to check out and worth the trip if you want to escape from the strip for a couple hours.
Great experience here! The price is reasonable and the environment is good. We had the meat lover for 4people and the size is enough. The food was good and you should try it if you like meat!
Great Korean food!! A lot of variety and great service. Definitely coming back here the next time I'm in town!!!
Great service, good lunch specials and food was great. Will be back next time we are in Vegas!

First impressions: the quality of the food was amazing & the service was excellent!

Would definitely recommend to family & friends
An excellent way to start a vacation in Vegas. Probably the best menu of food I've ever seen. I'll definitely be back next time I'm here.

Gangnam is like a better version of fondue. Fondue included! It's so much fun and reasonably priced. Endless sides. Delicious apps. Awesome sauces. Great drinks. And enjoyable atmosphere make this a 5 star experience.
Meat lovers must check out this Korean BBQ place! Very nice servers and big tables! One negative is a long wait with crowd, but I'm sure any popular places have long wait lists....

Very fast service, we came on a Sunday afternoon and didn't have to wait at all. The bulgogi meat was delicious!!!!!!!! 
Food was amazing!!! Cheap, fast, and delicious :-)
Came here during a vacation and needed some Korean after horrible hotel food. Their beef is excellent!  Took the kiddos and they loved it! The spicy tuna kimbab was awesome too.
The food was excellent. Fast service, great customer  service, very friendly abd helpful.  You get more than  what you paid for.
Quality beef, well marinated.  the bimbimpop is a must try. unlike some korean r restaurants service was very good and prompt.

I was originally looking for an all you can eat KBBQ place, which Gangnam is not. But after sharing an amazing meal with 3 friends, I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. All the meat is great, esp the marinated kalbi. The asparagus and mushrooms are fantastic as well.
Good food, good quality meats and good sides as well. Ordered the Meat lovers combo for 4 and left completely full with leftovers!! If your looking for some KBBQ in Vegas this is the place to go.

We always stay at the hard rock on our trips to Vegas & have passed this place several times but there was always a long wait & time was of the essence.  So tonight (Monday) we decided to finally check it out!  (With 4.5 stars and 4K plus reviews we knew it would be legit!). We were able to get right in, and order our food in a timely manner.  We got the premium dinner for two and let me just say it's PHENOMENAL!  The variety and quality is killer.  From one beef lover to another their carpaccio is the best I've ever had & I own an industrial meat slicer! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Wonderful service and delicious food. I would recommend spicy chicken with lemon. Also, the cocktails were outstanding! Mmmmm mmmm
Nice place to go and their price is reasonable. I ordered five dishes and all meat only spent twenty
First time here, the Kobe beef was amazing! Great service and the quality of meat blows other kbbq out of the water! Highly recommend if you're in the area! Also they have a great happy hour !!
Its really good! My fave was the bacon wrapped asparagus. I'll recommend it to my friends back home!

First time trying Korean & I'm glad this was the spot. UFC 194 and bomb Korean bbq! It was a lot of food for a good price. The people were very friendly and came by often to ask if everything was okay. It was my first time so I wasn't sure what to do. The guy was nice enough to help me out and explain how the food is eaten here.
Really good kbbq. Enjoyed bringing first timers to kbbq and they really enjoyed this place. The bbq had alot of favor
4 stars immediately for playing Kpop. Not to mention that the foods are good and great customer service. Well deserved 5 star!

Good place. Not too expensive.  They have 2 happy hours everyday, 1/2 price drinks and appetizers. 
Meat was good quality and lots of sides.
Service is impeccable! Food is just as good! Must come and enjoy very close to the strip. I must say its just as good as NYC.

Great, quick service! Nice staff and tasty food! There were 6 of us that ate here and the meat was able to fill us all and also was able to satisfy us. It's close to UNLV, so I'll plan on coming here if I get super hungry again. The food was served nicely and the presentation of the food was amazing, and the ambiance is great. Highly recommended for friends and family :-)

Soooo.. I was looking for a nice spot to have Valentine's Day dinner & happened across Gangnam. It might be off the beaten path, but it's definitely a diamond in the rough. Got here for happy hour & waited about a half hour to be seated. Ordered pork belly, chadulbegi, bulgogi, chicken fondue & a few other things. Bulgogi was not exciting, but everything else.. Wow. Simmered to perfection. Topped it off with a refreshing Sapporo & dinner was complete. Will definitely come back the next time I'm in Vegas.

Saw the reviews and decided to give it a try! WOW!!! We will be back again and again! Amazing , fresh, rich flavors. We had Fried meat dumplings, Sukiyaki noodles with shrimp and original BibiMbap. Authentic Korean atmosphere and great service. Loved it!
Great food! Great prices! Great service! One of the beat Korean BBQ places that I've been to.
Great cux service, , great food, very reasonable price!!!..will love to visit again wen I come back to Vegas..A++++++

Good kimchee, though some were a little sweet for me. Good quality meats! Tongue was great! Wish the Bulgogi and Spicy Pork were cut into larger slices. The Japanese peppers were a bit too spicy. I prefer the more mild ones.  Not bad overall.

This was our first time at this restaurant, and we were quite pleased.  The food was great and everything was very tasty.  Our waiter was also very nice, helpful, and accommodating.  I would definitely recommend GangNam and we will come here again when we are back in Las Vegas.
This has been my favorite place to eat in Las Vegas so far. It's best to go with a large group and share. The food was very good and very filling.
Food was amazing...If one wants to try out authentic Korean food... Then gangnam BBQ us the place to come...Even the ambients looks good....
Its a great kbbq....i love their beef toro, also chicken is super tender.   I recomend honey toast too

Great food, excellent service, and a very amicable and welcoming environment that makes me want more. I highly advise anyone into Korean/Japanese style cuisine with a modern twist to come here and try it out

If you're staying at Silver Seven or any of the surrounding hotels in the area- this is where you'll get the best value for your money. We got the harami miso, bacon wrapped scallops, & beef toro. The accompanying side dishes were just as delicious. Thanks, Gangnam!
Awesome food with great service!   Great pre-concert dinner.  We ordered the Meat Lovers and it plenty for four.   Delicious and a lot of fun cooking with family!
This place is clean and really nice place to eat I recommend it to anyone that loves Korean food!!
I've been here several times and did not disappoint! I heard the chef changed but it still tastes very good!

First of all, the staff is super friendly. We ordered the gangnam meal for two and it was a lot of food and delicious. I particularly enjoyed the fresh oysters which is surprising because I'm not usually a fan of oysters, but whatever they topped them with made them delicious. The marinated beef was tasty and tender. The price was not too bad for two, considering all of the food that comes with it.

Come from LA and have been to basically all the Korean BBQ over there and the quality of meat over here is one of the best I've had, especially for the price. It's nice and cozy and the service was great too, I'll be back fshhooooooooooooooooooooo
Amazing and fresh. The Spicy Tuna Kimbap was next level. Everything we had exceeded our expectations. We will be back... Next time for happy hour!
Must try Korean Restaurant in Las Vegas. Everything is delicious. We ordered Gang Nam combo, Kimchi tofu soup, spicy tuna.
Good quality of beef. Fast service. This place is a little far off. Recommend if you stay at Hard Rock or just want to avoid the crowd.
Excellent food, the service was super fast, it took us longer to decide what to order then for it to come out of the kitchen. Would highly recommend to anyone that is in Las Vegas!

I really enjoyed the calamari side dish never had it like theirs and I was very surprised to find it was delicious. 
I ordered the spicy noodle bowl and it was very tasty, slightly spicy & sweet at the same time. I hope I can find the same dish in San Diego when I leave Vegas. 
Definitely worth stoping by if your in the mood for this food.
had gangnam special, spicy calamari, pork belly and rice. way too much for 2 ppl but was definitely worth it. satisfied our korean food craving

Pretty good.  Two of us and we ordered 4 of their prime beef - tongue, filet mignon, prime kalbi, and toro - all good, except the mignon - it could be a better quality but it is priced appropriately.  A little skimpy on the mushroom medley but it also could have shrink during the cooking process.  The biggest con: we waited for 1.5 HR but it was during CES so it may not be typical.
Great quality, very attentive/friendly staff and always good vibes! I love this place! We're here at least once a month!

right across from the Hard Rock  where I was staying the past week & this is my second time coming here and I love it! beyond delicious food & amazing customer service. such a great place definitely would recommend to anyone!!

Nice place， great food！will come back soon！！
Highly recommend！
best Korean BBQ in Les Vegas.
My friends and I stopped at Gangnam BBQ on our way through Vegas. We were not disappointed! Excellent food. Excellent service. Highly recommend
Great food, good place to enjoy good BBQ with the family. Service is definitely helpful and good.
We love this place every we come to Vegas we come here with our kids and they love cooking on the grill.

Clean and inviting. Great service. Excellent food. Huge selection. Suggest making reservations.... as we are not big eaters, we picked from the Ala Carte menu but most people were ordering from the menu for 2.

Our first time and from start to finish great customer service !!!! Love how spacey it is for everyone to eat and food space while cooking. My favorite has to be the beef tongue, super soft and not chewy. They are generous amounts of food portions doe everything. The tagu was super good, a little spicy but perfect! The desert is so yummy! I had the coffee macaroon ice cream .. Should come here and give it a try. Hawaii portions aren't this generous.

Great food, reasonable prices and even better for happy hour.
Got combo for two. A lot of good food.
Did I say, happy hour beer 50% off : )
Drive safe!

I had my first tteokbokki here - it's super spicy! The meats are delicious. The restaurant is beautiful and clean. The people serving us were nice and always paying extra attention to what our needs were. Overall, it was a great experience. I would love to come again next time!

For some reason I decided to pour the extra tteokbokki  sauce over the rice and mix it up. I thought it was genius. Try it.
High quality meats.  Get as much variety as you can.  Not many banchan, but ok.  Can pass on the fried stuff.
