Great place for Korean BBQ.  They were busy so had to wait to be seated but the wait was worth it.  Loved the beef toro and bulgogi.  Bibimbop was really good and enough to feed 2.  Really good service.  We're from out of town but will definitely make this our togo place to eat.

In Vegas on vacation and wanted a local favorite off strip.  After checking trusty ol Yelp, I found this place with 2800 reviews and an avg 4.5 stars...pretty easy decision to come here.

EDIT:** I now know why this place has 2800 reviews, if you tell them you are reviewing them on Yelp they will offer you free dessert. **

Right away, you notice this small restaurant has limited tables due to the nature of the way you prepare the food.  What an awesome time.  Come here with a group, sit around a table and order one of the packages.  They come with a feast!! Appetizers, kimchis, salads, rice and tons of meat.

Everything we tried was great...the bulgogi and the pork were my absolute favorite meats.  I also loved the seaweed salad and the different Kimchi.

The music, was an interesting choice to say the least...not sure it fits the atmosphere.  We came on a Sunday night and it was gangster rap...it made us literally laugh out loud because of how out of place it was in a place like this.


The price was also not bad at all.  It ended up after tax and tip being about $40 a person for the 3rd package option..I don't remember the name.  You can get it down to as low as $20 per person on the package if you wanted to leave a few things out.

I would absolutely come back here again.  We all had a great time!

Okay. So this place is pretty awesome ! 
You order what you want to eat , and pay only for that. The best thing is that it's not AYCE & whatever is left overs you can take home. 
The Korean prime Kalbi is so good! A must try. 
We also likes enoki with  bacon!

Our waitress was also very sweet, she even charged my phone for me. 

The sauces , you get three. And they all were great! 

Despite the menu saying you have to pay for the salt sauce, it's complimentary. 

Ill update more once this food coma passes!
One of the best Korean BBQ we've had. We will definitely be back here next time we are in Vegas!
We got the #1 two people for $65, they are extremely friendly and helpful and allowed us to change items that would couldn't eat due to dietary restrictions. I would definitely come back!
Had to come back twice during the duration of our 4-day vacation! Thats how good it was!
Awesome BBQ place. The food is amazing. We tried the Gangnam combo plate, with nice variety of plates including oysters. When you come to LV must try this place.

Good service. Tender meats. Enjoy eating alone or with company here, just such a chill and friendly atmosphere. I've even come to study while my meat cooks. :) recommend the filet mignon! If you like squash definitely get the squash tempura mmmmm!

My boyfriend's brother and sister-in-law told us that when we visit they wanted to go to Korean BBQ with us. So we gathered up the family and checked out this place. Pretty decent sized menu with a lot of good options. There were 8 of us and we were all pretty hungry. We ordered a ton of food. Of the banchan was ok. The favorite was surprisingly the fish cakes. I ordered the bulgogi bibimbab and the cream cheese wontons (really just cream cheese inside
...) while almost everyone else ordered BBQ. The two least excited about it got fried rice and tried everyone's dishes. The bulgogi bibimbab was delicious. Perfectly cooked and flavored bulgogi. The rice was nice and crispy like it should be and the spicy sauce for it was a little sweet and a little spicy. Perfect dish! Everyone really enjoyed their first Korean BBQ experience. Would love to go back next time we visit

Went here with my brother and sister, it was really good. They had good kimchi and short ribs. The service was really quick and nice. All of the employees where really nice and friendly. I really like the shrimps that I had. Another good thing about this place is that they open later so around midnight and you feel like some Korean bbq, then definitely come here.
Great customer service and the meats are fresh. We ordered the meat lover packet for four at $99. The price is reasonable for the amount of food we got (a lot).

Came here during my vacation. It was around 15-20 minutes wait but it was worth the wait. I got the bulgogi bibibamp and it was good and kept hot throughtout my visit. My friends got several different meats and soups. All were pretty good!
Food was amazing but the wait was a little long but definitely worth the wait. Food was fresh and well priced. Also the ambience was well set and good for a date.
We paid for a $15 cab ride to get to this place 40 minutes before they were supposed to close only to be told that their kitchen was already closed.  What a disappointment and waste of money.

Soooooo bomb! First time here, we were fiendin some Asian food and this place was straight fire! You might as well call it, a body sesh. Couldn't even kill it all they gave us so much food! Def hittin this next time we're in Vegas!!!
Great food and service. The bulgogi is very tasty and the skirt steak is delicious. Looking forward to coming back again.

Best Korean food in town.   Happy hour items are amazing.  We ordered every one of the BBQ and appetizer.  It was such a great value. 
Our total cost was only about thirty five dollars for four people. In the end, we were all pretty full. Unfortunately here is no salad and rice is not include, but , can be purchased for extra cost.
The Beef toro is really tender so we ordered two plates of it. I would also recommend all the chicken items. Not only that all of them were three dollars,but it was really juicy and tender. I was not disappointed with anything. 
The grill does burn a bit but we only needed to change it once. 
The side dishes were cake, spicy cucumbers, sweet suit, kimchi, pickled onions and macaroni cheese. 
The service is really good. The waitresses were all really nice and kept checking on us. 
The location is a bit far from where I live. It is tucked in with a Cvs and a hot dog place.
Good food, nice place. We have tried various meat and they all taste delicious. The Kobe style beef is really remarkable.
awesome japanese korean bbq!!  servers are awesome and most likely the food!  and you get a free macaroons if you do a yelp review!!

I yelped this place to satisfy some craving for good Korean food. I have to say, it ranks up there with good spots in LA. Good cuts of meat and very reasonable prices. Happy hour specials are of very good value too. Will return for sure when the Vegas buffets get boring.
Everything fresh! The bibimbap is awesome, with a lot of beef in! Oyster is nice too!

Took a taxi all the way from the hotel. Ordered spicy seafood noodle and korean bean soup, first the bean soup is really salty. After they took it back and recoil seems a bit better. I recommend the spicy seafood noodle if you like spicy food, but no the bean soup, only few onion, cucumber, and tofu. There are 7 different side dishes, taste average. But the happy hour fried calamari is pretty good with the happy hour price.
在yeip上搜索的这家，个人感觉比较好吃，套餐量大根本吃不完。PS:好评送甜点。6个人点了6人套餐，根本吃不完。小菜很好吃！送的冰淇淋很好吃！   .........................

Came here with a group a friends since one of other friends back home recommend it. I got the vegetable  sukiyaki noodles and the broccoli cheese fondue and it was great. I would definitely come back whenever I'm in Vegas.
Very trendy. Friendly servers. Good Korean food away from CA. Tapas style Korean food. Yum.

Food was very good. I love it nice and clean no much smoke come out from grill. They give me a lot of potion set of Las Vegas for 2 people can't finish !# also happy hour a good deal 3pm-6pm so yummy food.
This is our first time here, and the people here are really nice. The small dishes and the dipping sauce are super good

This was a great dining experience. Great quality cuts of meat and plenty of side dishes to go around.

My fiancee and I came to Vegas for my birthday and we love Korean BBQ.  This was on par if not better than many other KBBQ restaurants we have been to. The portions are heavy as we decided for the meat lovers for 2 dinner. Food coma here we come. Thank you Gangnam Asian BBQ for a pleasurable dining experience.
I cannot say more good things about this place. The quality of food was really good and nice service. I strongly recommend this place for family meal
This is my favorite Korean restaurant in the Las Vegas area. I always tell my friends about it. We got the combo meat lovers plate as well as a bowl of soup. Everything tasted great!
I love the food and service. I ordered tofu soap and different kinds of meat. Everything tastes delicious.
Absolutely delicious. We got meat lover plate for two people and it was plenty. Well worth the money.
The food here was really good and well priced. It included a variety of side dishes. It was a fun and yummy experience. We will definitely be back again!
This place is amazing. Great portions and very tasty! Dynamite shrimp was outstanding. The Bulgogi was delicious as well.
Best Korean restaurant ever! It was so good. I would definitely come back here again. Everyone is so nice and they hook you up with lots of side dishes!
Great food and service. Especially, one of their staff name back. I would recommend here if you love bbq. I will come back next time!
The Korean Prime Kalbi and Kimchi Chigae is a must and Salmon carpaccio is good too. Love the food so much, Felt like when I was once ate in Korea

First time here.  Got my usual fave dish, Prime Kalbi.  Great service!  Our server "Donkey" was awesome!!  Food flavors and tastes are incredible!!  We're from Dallas.  But we will definitely be back if we're ever back in town!
Tremendous VFM amazing food and friendly staff along with your favorite K Pop videos.

This was my first experience in restaurants where you cook your own food. Now I am a fan of this idea. Can't complain about how the food is cooked because your the one cooking it. The food was very delicious, the side dishes complamented it well, and the service was very hospitable. I would absolutely recommend, and would come again!
Excellent service. Everyone here was so attentive and courteous. The food portions were perfect for the price. I highly recommend the Meat Lovers course! I would definitely go back.
The Prime Kalbi and the Kobe style beef are delicious. Nice atmosphere and really savory food! Try the mushroom medley!!

Decided to try this place for the first time based on a friend's recommendation.  I was blown away by the proportions and quality of food that they provided. By far the best Korean BBQ I've ever tasted.  

Definitely coming back here when I'm in Vegas
Food was great and service was awesome. Will be coming back next tome i come back! Really liked the kimchi!
Amazing food and service. I loved the diversity of the menu. Definitely need to get the uni bibimbap and the Kobe ssam! their uni is SO fresh!

This place is really close to UNLV.
It's my first time here, and I already love the place so much!
The waiters are not only handsome, but are really friendly to customers. 
Although the menu hee is really similar to Gyu-kaku, their cheese wonton and toro beef is definitely better!

This place is bomb. This is my second time ever to try Korean BBQ, and this time blew the last place out of the water. Service was great, the food was top notch, and they have a great happy hour :) next time I'm in Vegas, I'm coming back here!

We all liked that it closed late. We tried the corn, beef bulgogi, beef tongue, beef Korean prime rib, mushroom they were all very good. The calamari, fried chicken, and chicken fondue was ehh ok.

The servers were all very nice. The atmosphere was very inviting. Very clean and loved the music videos that was playing in the background.

It is off strip, but some of Vegas best foods are off strip. =)

We found this fabulous restaurant on yelp and LOVED IT!  our favorites are the Korean chicken,  spicy chicken and the beef toro!  We can't wait to come back and try more things!   We loved cooking our food at our table too!

This place offers a good lunch special for Korean BBQ at a fair price for what you pay for (9.95 or 12.95). They come with the traditional side dishes and 3 dipping sauces. It is well ventilated, not as smokey as other places. It is located close to the UNLV campus next to Undefeated and a sushi place. The service was prompt, since no one was here at this place on a Tuesday around 1.

Great place to visit while in vegas. Standouts were the chicken fried rice, Korean beef, marinated ribeye, and scallops. The lemon soju is also very good. Not too sweet like most others I have tried. Great value for vegas!
Excellent service, excellent quality food. reasonably priced. one of the best Korean BBQ I've been to! highly recommended!
I love the Marcoon but perphas it is only because of free marcoon they can have this review rate. The meet and BBQ itself is just so so compared to other places' Korean bbq
Nice place! We ordered Lasvegas for two, and it was very delicious. The staffs were very friendly as well. 5 stars!

I tried this place out secondary to the number of post, great comments and stars. Excellent choice! This place was awesome. I really enjoyed the enoki with bacon--you must try this. Actually everything we had was delicious and the price wasn't bad either. Great place and will come again.
Had the Gangnam combo, really good highly recommended. It was more than enough to feed us. Would definitely come back!

the boyfriend and i got the runaround in the downtown vegas restaurants and the one we really wanted to go to after reviewing options was closed for a private event and after walking around everywhere and checking other places out (overpriced, not what we wanted) we were starving and annoyed.  We were in the mood for kbbq and this place was barely a cab ride away.  

we had to wait so, SO long for a table.  Our fault - last minute planning, saturday night, super busy.  They aren't exactly set up for people waiting but got us drinks (yuzu soju was CRAZY good and so was the ginger soju cooler if not a little sweet).  We waited forever.  and ever.  and ever.  

The we finally sat and ate the best freaking korean bbq ever.  The pickles, the appetizers (spicy tuna kimbap) totally unnecessary but SO tasty.  We got the meat lover package deal and it did not disappoint.  Everything was amazing - pork belly, bulgogi, we were FIGHTING over the last pieces of spicy pork.  Just so crazy good.  It took hours but we were so stuffed and happy and barely rolled ourselves back to the hotel.  Totally recommend.

I used to only go to all you can eat bbq places. However, these days I prefer quality over quantity and Gangnam is just that. I absolutely LOVE this place!! 

Good vibe, good music, and I like all the Kpop music videos they play on the screen. I like how they treat you as you are walking in and very friendly servers! 

Hint: Happy hour specials!! Seems like the owner is re-inventing the menu every so often for the better!

Fuck yeah, this was my first time here and it was amazing!
Speedy service, amazing food, great atmosphere

Really good vegetarian kimchi bibimbap. Good service and happy hour prices too. Perfect for a late night run. Right next to Hard Rick Hotel. 

Friends had bulgogi and kalbi and loved it. They like the spicy sauce.

Very Good best Bbq in town I order the meat lover substitute spicy pork with garlic shrimp I also order asparagus with bacon so good and salmon jalapeño popper definitely recommend this place service was also good

Delicious dishes and the side dishes make all the flavors pop. The kimchi is so good and the different types of sauces they provide range from sweet to spicy. Service was spot on and the servers were very nice and polite.
Its our first time here so far: it has Nice atmosphere, accomodating staff & smells good inside lol

This Korean barbecue spot is a good place to satisfy carniverous cravings, if you can find parking. On weekends their lot can get pretty busy but, the hunt for a parking spot is worth it once you start grilling. My favorite item is the spicy pork. Leave it on the grill to get it extra crispy. Those charred edges give it a wonderfully crunchy texture to go with a moderately spicy profile. The prime kalbi was my second favorite. I loved the sweetness of the marinade that paired nicely with the natural savoriness of the marbled meat. Other items tried included tender chunks of filet, four decent sized garlic shrimp, and assorted vegetables (corn, mushrooms, peppers, onions, zucchini, and more). Portions run a little small, so it's best to order two or three items per person.

With a clean, intimate, dark interior it's great for casual date nights or just hanging out with friends or family. Tables are spaced rather far apart giving all plenty of privacy.

Visiting from Hawaii and let me just say.... They give a lot of food! (: We ordered the "LASVEGAS" course for two and we both left very very full. Service was great, fast staff and very friendly. I would definitely recommend anyone visiting to come here and try it out.
The foods is great here!! The service is pretty good,too. I love one of  broccoli with cheese, my favorite is the short-ribs. Spicy chicken!
The food is amazing & delicious. I would definitely recommend this place. Great customer service and very attainable.

They are still awesome as ever!!! Whenever my parents come to town they always request that we come here! It is so much fun cooking our food on the grill in front of us and they are also so knowledgeable about their food and are always willing to help those who are inexperienced with the cook times and their different sauces. They also have amazing appetizers! When I'm working I'll usually order a couple appetizers and make it a meal! Their Spicy Tuna Kimbap, Spicy Chili Dumplings, Cream Cheese Wontons, and Fried Carpaccio are only a few of my favorites!! Ohhh and don't let me forget the broccoli and cheese fondue!! Yes Please! I will forever be a loyal customer! They are great :)

The staff are sweet the food is amazing 
Great selection in choices 

Will definitely come back when we visit Vegas again.
Really good! Our server was attentive and the food was all good. Order the salmon wrapped in bacon and the miso meat.

Delicious!  Meat cuts are juicy, well-marinated and tender- one of the best korean bbq places in terms of flavor that we have ever tried!  A la carte prices are ok and worked well for us (2 parents with moderate+ appetites and 2 kids with small appetites). If you have a giant appetite, then the set combo packages for 2, 4, 6 people might work better.  We will definitely be back!
Extraordinary food. We came in at happy hour and the Sapporo from the tap was really good. Decent prices and service is very fast and friendly. Great place, definitely coming back!

One review for free desert! So why not lol~~~ happy hour after 10, and you can order a lot of good meat on the menu! We had pork belly, spicy pork, Korean chicken and mushroom. Gotta add a lettuce wrap for pork belly! love the steamed egg.

I recommend the gangnam combo, prime Kali is highly recommended. This is the best place to have lunch with friends. Marinated beef is also great, and side dishes are surprisedly delicious. Anyway, if you want to try authentic Korean BBQ, this is the place you should come.
The service is great and the dining arrangements are very spacious!

Best Korean Bbq beef in Vegas. I had the poke, spicy tuna, and cheese corn and let me say this it was great. I'm not a fan of Korean Bbq but this place made reconsider that. I will be back and I would recommend this place to everyone.

Awesome, fresh food. Nice touch that you cook for yourself. Very reasonable prices. It's more of a Korean BBQ for those who know what that is. Being out of town I'm sad I can't have this close to my house! Expand into LA already!
really good BBQ restaurant，never try this resturant before，everyone should try this～ recommd！
Came here to get my Korean fix...great food and value! Service was excellent! The pork belly was my favorite.

Phenomenal Korean BBQ. Came for the food, stayed for the friendship. My favorite dish was the Harami Miso with the spicy sauce. Reverse happy hour is a great deal $4 Apps and half off beer. Also please note they have a great soundtrack.

This place has such a high number of reviews which is surprising that the score is really high. In my opinion the most that this place deserved is a three star. We came in around 7pm with a group of 11 people and was seated within 20 minutes. The place looks fairly clean and nicely decorated. The food was good but not great. The portion was really small. You would have to order a ridiculous amount to get full off of their portions. On top of that, they charge $2 for a small bowl of white rice. Their banchan was good and we were given a good amount. The waiter that we had were not very friendly. I couldn't get him to refill my Coke until the end of the meal. Over all this is not a place I would go back to again with a large group of people. I may revisit if it's me and another petite person who doesn't eat much. Don't go here if you want more bangs for your buck.

Just came in with a group of friends and quickly seated. Their service is quick and friendly. Hands down the best place in vegas area. I recommend the kalbi and the bulgogi . I can eat here every week. I recommend this place!
I've eaten Korean all over the world, literally, and this is one of the best!!! We got the meat lovers combo and all the different types of meat were awesome.
Best bbq in town!!! Highly recommended.... I love Korean prime Kal I and beef bulgogi. But don't forget the sangria.. So tasty!
The bibimbap was delicious! Great atmosphere. We came in at lunch time and were seated fairly quickly.  We will have to come back again to try the other dishes!
Great Korean BBQ, not far from the strip.  Had the meat lovers for 2 and was a lot of food.  Great Happy Hour 3-6. Come hungry
The BBQ is excellent ！！ Best recommend the Kobe Beef and the Best Seller .The service is good too ！！

This is my first time to gangnam korean bbq! But i can say that this was the best choice i've made in las vegas. The staff was really nice and all complimentary side dishes were delicious! Of course the main dishes, korean bbq was even better than the dishes served in real korea!!! I'll definitely go this restaurant whenever i visit lv in the future!!
The best korean BBQ in Las Vegas. Good service too. I will definitely come back again.
和朋友來 上菜速度偏慢 食物還可以  come with friends for lunch, food is ok

First time here and it was a great change from the AYCE KBBQ norm here in Vegas! Came in during the happy hour which was from 3pm-6pm and was seated right away! We ordered the cream cheese wonton, fried calamari, (2) beef toro and (2) bulgogi. They also gave us the ban chan (side dishes) when you order a minimum of 2 BBQ dishes. The rice bowl portions are pretty hug so depending on how much meat you get I think one bowl can fit between you and another person. I love how it definitely fills up 2 people with less of a price than all you can eat KBBQ joints here in Vegas (Tofu Hut, Korean Garden BBQ). Overall great experience, will be coming back again soon!
Great food!! On the particular night we went we had an extremely long wait. Almost an hour. That was not good but everything else was amazing.
It was the best Korean BBQ I have ever had. The garlic steak was amazing. I highly recommend.

tried this hole in the wall spot for a late night happy hour.. ahhhh-mayyyy-zing !! the menu included kbbq meats that were more of a tapas style, but still good portioned. everything was cheap too !! we ordered the beef toro, bulgogi, and spicy chicken and everything was delicious. I was surprised bc most of the places I've been, there's always at least one thing food/restaurant wise that ends up being so and so, but not here. that staff, to top it off were all kind, easy going, and fun. my bf ordered a few sake bombs and some of the staff came and knocked on the tables with us to drop the bomb. this is definitely our go to KBBQ spot from now on. so good & happy we tried it.

Now I know why so many people have come here. Although if I have to give a fair review I would say that with this many reviews, they could upgrade their cable service to HD. Other than that, servers had a great attitude and food was on point!
So good and great service. Kids loved it, too! Everything was delicious and flavorful!
Not your typical all you can eat Korean joint but you will not be disappointed. Amazing meats and good sized portions. Must try!
Food and service awesome! Best Korean barbecue. Better than china town. Best kimchee and miso soup
This place is really good very fair price..Our family and friends all enjoyed the food and atmosphere..

Very good service! Food was delicious and superb. Will come back again! The meat was savory and it was a great traditional Korean BBQ experience. The banchon was fresh and tasty as well. The two person Vegas meal was plenty enough for the three of us. We left feeling very satisfied.

The food here are great! 
The service is good too. 
The price is reasonable. 
Want to take fiends to come here again.

The thing about this restaurant is:
Every item on the menu is just very good! The mosh rooms, the crunchy seaweed, the pork, the everything really.
Really good bulgogi! Awesome Korean Bbq place. Highly Recommended! Love their seaweed salad
Service was amazing! Food was just as delicious. Love the atmosphere, waiters & waitress' were super nice. Do recommend!!
The servers are very nice and the BBQ tastes very good. I love meat!! Very good eating atmosphere and best place for family get together!

The best BBQ I've had in a long time. I had the spicy pork as well as the beef. So good! I loved being able to cook my own meal and enjoy the time conversing with friends. I would definitely recommend the restraint to anyone who is considering.
Great service and value! The meat, poultry and seafood were fresh.  Good prices during happy hour, half off on drinks!

Went to this restaurant with a group of 12 co-workers and I must say the atmosphere is pretty relaxed but definitely has an upscale feel to it.  All of the meats were of very high quality and flavorful.  The fried rice is also very delicious and enough for two people to easily share.  The staff was very accommodating.  I look forward to going back again when I go to Vegas in March.
It was good and delicious good place to dinner for two or more. We ordered the meat lover combo for two, it was enough food for two people and the taste was good too.

Best Korean BBQ  in Las Vegas!  They have combo for 2 or 4 with cheap price! U can refill the side dishes many time as u want! The services here are nice too! Especially a guy he"s very handsome and cute!

We ordered the meat lovers combo.

Omg tons of food! Great side dishes. I liked the macaroni salad and kimchi.

Meat: the spicy pork was my favorite. All of it was tasty and cooked well. I had the chefs cook the meat.

The salad and miso were also tasty.

I would come back and recommend this place. 

Now I'm writing this review and looking forward to my free dessert :)

good food. good service, but some items are too salty.
i probably wont come back again.
This place smells so good it's making my mouth watery! The food is delicious! Love the seaweed salad. The staffs are very nice and helpful! I recommend trying this place out!

Excellent service, food was amazing and ambiance was very enjoyable. I recommend going during lunch time, not crowded at all. Plus there is happy hour special from 3-6 including some food and drinks. The best part about the experience is cooking your own food, but don't forget it like I did occasionally  I recommend this place and I'm planning on coming back hopefully soon.
Best gangnam style barbecue...this place rocks the meat is prime time! I'm going back baby!

This place was fantastic.  We had the meat lovers package for 9 people. I thought it wasn't gonna be enough but we all left satisfied. YUM! The restaurant was clean and the atmosphere was really nice. The musical selection was also on point. It's great a thing I work right across the street cause I'll definitely be here more often.
Good food . Good service . I love the beef tounge here. Its hard to find places with the tounge. Nice decor fast service

I came to eat here in a party of four. We did the "meat lovers". It was a very good deal. The food was plenty to split between the four of us, maybe even a little too much. This along with all the sides definitely filled us all up. Very clean restaurant and I like the ambiance. Also like how every person gets their own tongs.
I got the Spicy Ramen with Sausage and it was to die for! I loved the spices in it. Perfect spice not too hot but delicious!! Our server Back was great, made the visit a pleasant one!

Efficient is how id describe this place. The service was competent and friendly. 

The food was fresh and delicious.  I did tapas style and never looked back!!

Definitely a good spot for lunch. The garlic calimari was awesome!
Best Korean bbq in town, highly recommended,very friendly service, will definitely come back again

We purely went on the yelp reviews and yet again it does not disappoint.  We had a picky eater and chose the meat lovers.  Between 4 of us, we couldn't finish it all.  Everything was well flavored, tender and fresh.  The place is spotless and the service is friendly.  Highly recommended!!
Quality meats. We ordered beef toro, bulgogi, pork belly, Korean chicken cheese fondue and they are all excellent. You can't go wrong with this place !!
Amazing!!!! Better than grandma made and she cooked traditional Korean food for me growing up. I want to come here everyday. Happy Hour is totally worth it

One of the best places in town. Thanks to a local friend i was able to find this place! Quality of their meat is comparable to the place i went yesterday "Sage @ hotel Aria" which the price was at least 4 times more than this awesome place! Definitely recommended!
Love this place! Happy is amazing and the food is always ready fast. Highly recommend.
The best Korean BBQ in las vegas, you need to try the Kobe beef, very very good! Everything here is sooooo good, especially if you are a meat lover like us:)

Gangnam Asian BBQ is great! I have been to many Korean restaurants, this one is now my favorite! It is a great concept. You can tell they cared about every aspect of the restaurant. They have amazing food, great ambience, and superb service. I  love the music videos. I will defiantly return!
Every dish deserves . Sides and cooked meat alike. Completed this review for a free dessert!
After taking our order, we waited for more than 30 minutes. The food is fine. Delicious beef and pork. The chicken wings are so so.

Combination portion is perfect for two, if not too much. Kobe beef is a must try; kalbi is very good too.  Filet mignon is so-so, so is the shrimp.  Kobe beef carpaccio and tuna poki are both very good.  

Also ordered a separate steamed egg and the uni Kobe appetizer.  Uni is great.  Steamed egg is the worst I have ever had; way overcooked that I can't even tell it was egg.

Best Korean BBQ in town. 
Super good meat!
 Price is reasonable and the service was good.
I will definitely come back again :-)
Awesome food, Awesome service and, Awesome atmosphere! Good time with friends or just for a date night. Definitely recommend to any and everyone! Will be coming again!
Customer service was great! Food is delicious! Love the free dessert! We'll definitely come back!

One of the best Asian bbq places my boyfriend and I have eaten at. The egg soufflé was surprisingly amazing. We had the gangnam which was good. Top few dishes we had were the bibimbap and Kobe carpaccio and of course the egg soufflé. Must come if you are visiting las Vegas only 6-10 dollars away on a uber.
Good food, great service.... Second time but we will come back.   This will be our fav restaurant from now

Came here for the first time to eat off the strip. Pretty tasty, not the best as coming from Southern California where there's plentiful Korean BBQ everywhere our expectations are high. Not all-you-can-eat, could get a little pricy as we ordered al la carte instead of one of the combo packages because we didn't want everything in the package. Nice atmosphere, attentive servers. Overall, good.
This place is awesome and food is fresh and sooo delicious.  Though the place is a little small, but environment is comfy and relaxing!!!
First time really enjoyed it. The waiter was really helpful. All the food we tired was very tasty.
Got the Gangnam. I'm stuffed and happy. Very good quality food. Service was great. Deserts good too. Opa gangnam style

This place is a little heaven in the wall. Walking in, you can smell the aroma of cooked BBQ meat. We were so excited to try this based off many positive Yelp reviews.

There is a 2 order BBQ meat minimum for the sides, which isn't hard to do because we wanted everything!! We ordered bulgogi, spicy pork, spicy chicken, Kalbi, and pork belly. All the meat came out perfectly marinaded and so tender! The only thing was the pork belly, it came plain with no marinade. I would definitely order round 2 if I had the stomach to. 
We also ordered the spicy tofu soup, which was also equally delicious. The tofu is very soft, which is the way I like mine. 

The pricing here is definitely affordable as well. They have a happy hour menu from 10pm-1am. Appetizers and BBQ will be either $3 or $4. And they have half off drinks! 

I definitely left here feeling full and satisfied. If I lived in Vegas, I would definitely come here for Korean BBQ.
Great Korean BBQ. Happy hour was awesome 3-6. Ambiance is nice. Yum yum! And dessert... Free macaroon ice cream with this review!!!
Very close to the strip, worth giving a try! The meats are extremely tender. Restaurant is very clean and well ventilated.
Amazingly simple yet delicious and unique. A must try for lovers of meat and flavor. Don't forget to order a bottle of Soju or a soju cocktail. Will be here every time I visit.
Decent price. Meat was pretty good quality. The service could be better as far as attentiveness but overall a great experience.

Great service! great food! totally will come back.
ambiance is pretty nice nice outlet for a date or family night! it made my night for me and my family. they also made sure everything is well taken care of
Great quality food at a very reasonable price. Half the Prime Kalbi and it was great. All the sides were fresh and tasty. Located across from the Hard Rock, this place is a new favorite of mine.
Friendly service, knowledgeable staff and great food! Must try their Gabi and steam egg! Our go to place for Korean food in Vegas and Kids approved

Been to many Korean BBQ places in vegas~ this has got to be the best one. Unlike the all you can eat places; the quality of meat is fresh. We ordered the premium package for 2 people and we had 4 in our party and was still unable to finish the order!

Let me start by saying that I don't like Korean barbecue. In fact, I don't like Korean food, other than the occasional tofu house--and by occasional, I mean once a year. But this place swept me off my feet. 

We, a party of six, arrived before the restaurant opened at 11:30 a.m. and waited outside for the doors to open. As we stepped in, someone started to set our table with all the side dishes; as soon as we were seated, we started nibbling. These were high-quality side dishes, from the fishcake slices to the kimchi. There was also macaroni salad, pickled cucumbers, etc. All of these items are "refillable" upon request.

While the menu includes weekday lunch specials and meal sets (four different options for parties of 2 or 6), we opted to order a la carte so we could get each item we wanted:
-Kobe beef carpaccio ($9.95): So good! Thin slices of meat heaven, really. There was enough for each of us to have 2-3 pieces, too, so definitely a generous serving.
-Spicy tuna kimbap ($6.95): Kind of like a spicy tuna with crispy rice roll that you'd find at some Izakayas, but the rice is rolled up in seaweed, and the tuna is poke-style. You get the soft fish and the crunchy rice with a light sriracha mayo flavor--comes together very nicely. It's four rolls, but we managed to share between six of us. 
-Tteokbokki ($4.95): Consisting of soft rice cake, fishcake (same as the side dish), and hot sauce, this dish took me by surprise. It looks like a simple bowl of rice cakes, but is full of flavor, not awfully spicy. Make sure that you get a fishcake slice with the rice roll to get all the flavors together. A good, cheaper option for something that's a bit more filling.
-Spicy ramen egg ($6.95): I was skeptical, but boy was I proved wrong! This was one of the most enjoyable bowls of ramen I've had, even though it really was just ramen, egg, some greens, and spice. Like the tteokbokki, it's simple, but so good for the soul and for the tummy. You can opt for the Japanese sausage/ seafood options for additional cost.
-Bibim nangmyun ($11.95): Spicy cold thin noodles. This was my least preferred of all the dishes, but even then, I'd give it a 4/5. Nothing bad about it, just that it's not as savory as it looks, though you can add whatever sauces you want. I'd recommend mixing in some of the spicy fishcake side dish for additional flavor. 
-Original bibimbap ($12.95): Our server helped us mix everything together and even dished it out to each of us. Best bibimbap I've had, hands down. Flavorful, filling, and "healthy" (because of all the veggies in it, of course).
-Beef toro ( 2x$4.95), beef tongue (2x$8.95), flat iron garlic ($8.95), Korean prime kalbi ($8.95): I couldn't really tell the difference between any of them, but it doesn't matter, because they were all so delicious. For the meats that aren't already marinated, definitely use the three sauces provided to you--in fact, I recommend dipping the same piece of meat into all three sauces to get a slightly sweet/ tangy, and definitely spicy kick to your otherwise unflavored meat. 

All of this cost only $125--including tax and gratuity! All six of us were extremely stuffed and very happy. Oh, AND with Yelp check-in, we each got a free macaron for dessert... Maybe not the best life choice, but who can turn down a free dessert?

I came with my roommates for my birthday. I love the decor and selection of food on the menu. There was 3 of us and we ordered the meatlover package, it was plenty of food for us! The quality of meat was excellent and and the side dishes were delicious. I will definitely be back to try more of the menu!

Awesome Korean bbq place! I'm from LA and I have no complaints whatsoever!
Whenever we come visit Las Vegas we always come here and my son is picky with meat so if he likes it then it's legitimate meat. It's high quality Resturant with excellent service.
The spicy yuke jang is the best! Servers are quick and have very nice attitude! Try beef toro, too!

Taste good, combo for two on the menu is worth the price! Environment is clear and feel comfortable! The Korean lady is very nice and always smiles to customers! The service are great! They refill the side dishes all the time!

This place is the best. They treated my wife like a queen on her birthday and the food is always amazing.  I tried beef tongue for the first time and it was really good. Also, banana tempura for dessert is a must. Thanks for providing awesome food and service!
It was a nice experience for the time of night and money spent. There we a few happy hour food specials that were pretty good. Check it out.
It's a really good restaurant! Meats all delicious ，thanks for my best friend told me this place ，I will go there again next time to visit Las Vegas

great place to enjoy a great dinner . they serve alot of food when you order the package for 2 for 45 dolars ,, had 2 people eat and still had food left over ! i like that its open late and the fact that even tho its late it stays very busy!

Very delicious. Will definitely visit it again when in town again!

We ordered the meat lover combo, which is more than enough for two persons. Also, we ordered some side dishes, for example, the original bibimbap and spicy seafood noodles, which are both very delicious.

Has to be the Best Korean BBQ in Las Vegas.  From the time we entered to the time we left everyone and everything was the best. Service, food  ect... Their were four of us we ordered the 4 people meat lovers meal. From the start the food was excellent and then it just keep coming and coming, If you walk away from this table hungry you must not like Korean food.
Their is probably more then enough food to feed 5 or 6 people.

This is a must for Korean BBQ. I will be back.

While attending Cisco Live, one of my instructors recommended this place, so I decided to give a try. I brought my family as well, and we all enjoyed eating here! We came during late night Happy Hour, which I would recommend so you can grab some deals. We ordered the bulgogi bibimbap and some bbq meats, which we all enjoyed. It's off the strip, but would totally recommend anyone to come and try it and it was worth the trip.

By far the best Asian BBQ we have ever had. We had the Las Vegas for for 4 people and was more than enough. The food was fresh and super tasty. If you are ever visiting Vegas like us , this place is must.

Came all the way from San Diego for the WFG a Conference and found this precious gem! Wow delicious Korean BBQ! Glad we checked Yelp and it delivered to our expectations. Will definitely come back and recommend to all! Great service and friendly staffs as well. Will be back soon!
Great Korean BBQ.  Hit the spot for the whole family.  Ordered different meats and cheese fondue.  Nice decor.
The food is excellent plus very nice atmosphere here. The price is reasonable. Will definitely come back if I visit Las Vegas again.
This was an excellent meal! Besides the wait.. The food and service is totally worth it, everyone is so happy and friendly. Definitely see myself coming back here again!
Best Korean BBQ in Las Vegas! Good selection, reasonably priced and great service! We always make sure to come to this place when we are here in Vegas!
This place is a must eat BBQ place in Las Vegas. We ordered Gangnam course menu and it was delicious! We loved the happy hour after 10pm and the Sapporo pitcher was 50%off. I highly recommend it!

I heard from a friend about it and when my family came to visit I brought them here. We all like the food very much. The quality of the meat is very good. It's easy to find and the servers are friendly. I'd come again if I'd like to have asian bbq in Las Vegas
Awesome good food,  loved it . good ambience for families and kids. Amazing environment and the quality of food is really good at affordable price.

I wish I could find this place earlier. Compared to a lot overpriced restaurants on Strip. The food here is delicious with reasonable price.l though it is not all you can eat. The beef is tender the cut of beef tongue is a little thick but still good. The only real complaint is the veggie. I order the mushroom and asparagus but they are all ready to eat and they are cooked directly over fire. I would like to cook them by myself. Still it is a very nice place to visit. If you are not seeking for high-end dining experience on Strip yet still want some place better than Panda Express with reasonable price, this is the place you should visit.
We've been here twice a day and had las vegas menus. It has awesome food and service. :)
First time here. Everything was great. Came during happy hour and bulgogi was my fav !!
I love the atmosphere here. The place looks clean too. I like the food, but I definitely had better meat.
One of the best Korean BBQ in town. Good meat quality and service with a variety of nice desserts. Also nice atmosphere with hip hop music on screen.

great food, great service, awesome cook.
they have a good atmosphere, with a cooking stove in the middle. I would eat here again.
Great food! Great Service! No wait on a Sunday afternoon! Everything was busy wonderful! (:

Five stars for the great food, service, ambiance, pricing and menu! The Harami Miso was tender and full of flavor, making it my favorite amongst the other meats we had. I enjoyed my Pear Martini but if you're a beer drinker, they've got plenty to choose from. They give you three sauces which were good but I also ordered a side of sesame oil and sea salt to dip my meats in. You'll also get seven side dishes just like you would at most Korean restaurants. I will definitely be back when visiting Las Vegas!

Everything is just perfect! I've never tried any Korean food as good as these. We almost gave up while waiting. Thankfully we returned and enjoyed our meal. The mix tempura and the prime kalbi taste so good!

This place is so delicious!! We ordered 4 different types of meat. The miso harami was my favorite! We also ordered the Korean short rib, bulgogi, and brisket which were also really good. The quality of the meat is on point! Plus, they give you macaroni salad and fish cake among other sides, but those 2 were definitely my favorite. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone not looking for ayce!

Most meat were over marinated, salty and loaded with MSG (except the pork toro and belly).  Meats are small portion and not of great quality as shown in the menu.
At almost $7, they serve you 5 dead fucking shrimp that's not fresh at all.  
$7 can get you a pound of good shrimp!!!!

"How the f they get 2280+ average 4 stars review then?"  they offer free desert if you write an review!
Great place to eat!! If you are looking for a korean bbq place this is the place to be! Good food, excellent service!
Fantastic! Our first meal in Las Vegas! Many choices provided in the combo and the meat are really great!
Food was amazing!! Service was out of this world. Atmosphere was very relaxing. My company was not too shabby too! :) Really... This is a must do in Vegas.

Very good service and delicious food overall 
It will be a nice meal for family and friends

This place got good foods and delicious ban-chan. Spicy seafood noodle, soon-tofu and spicy rice cake are great. 
Nice environment with good services. Open until 1:00 a.m. on weekdays which is nice for people who stay up late.

I want let you know this is really recommend for all ages.
Great services
Great food
This isn't all you can eat but you can add.
Anyway the meat is excellent.
We got ordered the gangnam and the meat lover.
They are delicious. We will come again

When I go to a Korean barbecue place, I always go for all you can eat because I can get most of my money worth. Gangnam isn't all you can eat, but you are still getting your money worth.

Atmosphere is that of a high end restaurant. Dimly lit, fancy decorations, expensive looking grills, professional looking servers, & popularly hip music. What caught my attention the most was a projector showing music videos of not only well known recent English music, but they also have popular Korean groups also. I find myself dancing & singing along.

The servers are very helpful in recommending what to order. They're able to describe each dish or drink well enough to make a decision. They also give honest opinions on whether one thing is better than another thing.

The meats were served looking really fresh & presented really well on a plate. Of all the Korean barbecue places not one where I've seen the meat served already seasoned.

Not many Korean barbecue places I know have a Happy Hour or lunch special. This place has pretty good deals on their appetizers & meat. For the money you spend at all you can eat places, you'll have a better experience here compared to any other Korean barbecue place in Vegas. Drinks, meats, food, desserts - you can definitely taste the difference in quality & you can even make others jealous with a picture of a nice presentation too!
Good food. Just wish there was an all you can eat. Great for happy hour 3-4 dollars per meat.
Awesome food and great service! Plenty of food in the portions the Spicy chicken with Lemon sauce was my favorite.
I love the a-la carte concept. It makes it so easy to order with your friends. The wait staff is so friendly and accommodating. I definitely recommend this place to all Korean food lovers.
Great food at great prices! Come during happy hour for half price drinks and food. Really loved the bulgogi and green apple soju! Staff was really friendly and helpful.
Nice vibe. Attentive service. I tried the vegetarian bibimbap and it was mediocre. However, the BBQ meat dishes other tables ordered looked pretty good.

Had dinner here last night. Not really the authentic Korean barbecue that I was expecting. We had one of their popular combination specials. Meat was good, but Kimchee wasn't too good.  Service was pretty good with an easy location to find. Next time I'll try one of the other barbecue places.
Everything was on point all the way from the kimchi to the green apple soju cocktail and the las Vegas special! Definitely brings back good memories from the time I spent in South Korea.
overall The beef are very soft and have a good taste. They gave so many delicious appetizer. So very recommended.
Great food and great service, would be a 5 star if there were refills for drinks and/or side dishes.

Very different styles than what we have in nj, but the food is abundant and very tasty. We had to wait over 40 minutes for our table, but we were offered a free dish for our long wait. Would definitely recommend this restaurant to everyone.

Meal was pretty good, though ive had better. Its a good spot to come to for a quick, simple meal. Oysters were great. They have several different options to choose from for different pallets. Overall, good environment and service.
Best Korean BBQ in Vegas hands down! Had the  best seller Gangnam family platter.   It says it's good for 2 people but good enough for a family of four
The service was great and the meat lovers order for 4 people was the perfect portion size for our group with enough variety and sides to satisfy us all.

So bomb! You have to get the jalapeño poppers and the bulgogi.   This place gives you a whole bunch of free yummy side dishes!  Cook it yourself ;) it's a lot of fun :) the service is very good and you should all come for happy hour! Good choices on happy hour and 50% off drinks!!

Best Korean BBQ in Vegas! Great food, good portions, good quality meats, and good service! Price is very reasonable for the amount of food you get! We had the Gangnam #1 combo and it was plenty for lunch for 3 people. Will return when back in LV!

Wow what a hidden gem. Do yourself a favor and get off the strip for some really good food. Do not mistake this place for one of those cheap all you can eat Korean buffets. This place has set menus based on number of people or a la carte if you want to make your own combination.
The must have appetizer is Uni and pork belly. It's low carb, fatty and creamy. All kinds of yummy goodness. Seriously. One order has two wraps so order accordingly. 
The meat is such good quality. Trimmed and perfectly marbled. You can choose marinated or natural. I recommend natural since the quality of meat was excellent it doesn't need much. This is how you know the place is good when you grill the meat simply and dip it in a bit of sesame oil, salt and pepper. 
This is now my new must go to place when I come to Vegas. One of the best Korean restaurants in Nevada and I highly recommend it.
The food was very good. You get a lot (in quantity and variety) for what you pay. The atmosphere is also very cool. Really enjoyed the music videos projected on the walls.

Outstanding set up they have here. Food was brought out quickly and the staff tended to us often and politely. The stove popped a couple times and burned my girlfriend mildly, who reacted very poorly for supposedly having ninja blood in her. Such a shame. Anyways other than that food was outstanding as mentioned and the experience was outstanding and we really enjoyed ourselves. 4/5 for us.
Really delicious Korean BBQ! Very fast service with grill your own meat style. Meat lovers for two is perfect and has a lot of meat and rice and side dishes. Would definitely come back.

Absolutely fantastic! Initially I was apprehensive about cooking my own meat because I don't like The Melting Pot but this experience was not like that all. They bring you so many delicious meats that you cook over a table mounted grill and the meat cooks very quickly and is extremely delicious. 

The level of service is excellent as well. Three of us ordered the Meat Lovers for two and oh my God it was so much food that we took some home. I am definitely looking forward to coming back!

Good food but too busy restaurant 
Great meat. Clean environment 
Fair priced 
Very friendly staff.

This is really good: very good good and service. Price is reasonable. The pitcher of beer is very large and very full. Anyway, strongly recommend to one who likes meat and drink. We catches happy hour deal, so the drink becomes very attractive in terms of price.

The servers are always so accommodating, kind, and considerate here!! I love coming here with friends. A great place to recommend to people I meet near the university. Side dishes taste good. I always order the bulgogi bibimbap as my rice to eat with whatever else we order.
Today, we had an awesome menu of: salmon, brisket, bulgogi, bulgogi bibimbap, chicken tender cheese fondue, and cheese wonton!
Thank you for the wonderful lunch!
This place is amazing!   Everything was very very good.  We had the gangnam platter.  It was fantastic

this place is fantastic!  i've done the whole korean bbq thing where you cook up your meats on your table yourself in LA once, with some Korean friends showing us how it works.  this is perfect and the food is great!  we loved the spicy tuna kimbap and the bimbimbap and the choice beef selections, and they had a happy hour special for us at midnight!  Our server was a fantastic host, to boot.

If you are staying at Hard Rock, it is just across the street (that's where we are staying).  I particularly like to get out of the casino restaurants and away from the strip and tourists when i come to Vegas.  This place is a great stop!  highly recommend
Bomb Happy Hour. It's a little golden gem right off of the strip. Jose was such an awesome! I would come back anytime I'm in Vegas. :-)
I liked the suggestions. I chose the best seller. It was really good. Staffs were kind. When we wanted something, they quickly came and served us

Pretty standard Korean bbq with Japanese influences... The wait staff is pretty nice. The liquor is cheap and so is happy hour.... Compared to LA OR NYC KBBQ... It's on the pricier side but the atmosphere and decor is ok.

Best KOREAN BBQ in Las Vegas. 
It's nice and clean and good service. 
I would come back again.
Great place to meet family. We have all met up here and the servers were awesome and attentive, they made our visit very pleasant.

The food was great. We ordered meat lovers and Kobe meat for 2 for a party of 3 and were extremely satisfied. It was very filling. The staff was very courteous and quick. I'd definitely recommend this place. Try grilling your fish sticks

This is probably the best bbq places I have even been. I like the atmosphere here. The food is delicious and fresh. I will definitely come again. 
The service is great, everything is great I really enjoy eating here. Such a nice experience. Hahahahaha.

We went out for a late dinner after our show. Eating a lot of meat at 9 pm did not sound too appealing so we ordered the Las Vegas set, which comes with the least amount of meat. I can't believe how much food we were served. This was supposed to be for 2 people, but even with the 3 of us we couldn't finish all of it.

This restaurant is very very efficient. We were asked if we wanted to be seated at the bar. We said yes and all of the sides and food were being handed to us at the speed of light. The only thing they didn't do is feed us so that we could get out sooner. I appreciate fast and efficient service!

I loved their spicy chicken and regular chicken!! The chicken was delicious and perfectly cooked. My friends worked on eating the beef. The restaurant gave us freshly made miso which was light and refreshing. I am so used to eating the crappy instant miso. This use of real miso paste was a welcome touch. Their sides are good, but nothing to write home about.

The amount of food and decent quality definitely justified the $45 cost.
Best bbq ever!! Price is reasonable! If you wanna get some korean food, I recomand Gangdam as Korean

This is by far the best kbbq I have been to. The service is excellent and the quality of food is top of the line. Shout out to Beck for the entertainment and keeping our grill fresh. You da man Odell "BECK" Ham. Aka O.D.B. 


Ps. The music is lit.
Great service, tasty food, nice decor, you cant go wrong with this place. I love the decor here, and not to mention the macaroon ice cream :)

Went with friends from California on our last night of our EDC vacation! Was super delicious, service was very nice, and atmosphere was young and fun!

Recommendations? Try out the spicy tuna kimbap if you like sushi, and for the meat get some bulgogi!

New to this style of Asian food, nevertheless the wait staff were extremely patient with all of our questions. They also made suggestions that enabled us to try more dishes for less money, which was TREMENDOUSLY appreciated!  The food was fresh and delicious. A few items were too spicy for me, but they were still flavorful. Service was excellent! Prices quite reasonable.
Recently got free side there's the extra star they were missing A+ if you want Loren BBQ Vegas doesn't have any really good ayce options but this is one of the best places to go.

This restaurant has a chill ambiance with good music. They have a nice happy hour prices. Affordable cheese wontons, mmmmm.  I think the meat could be more flavorful but the additional sauces complemented them well enough. Sides were good but the kimchee was a little too strong for me. Spicy tuna kimbap was booomb, though, get it.
Found this place by accident when visiting Vegas. Fast service, great customer service and great food!  I will be back next time I'm in town!!
The food is delicious! It comes out super fast and all the sauces are tasty. Love the jalapeño poppers

I came here by searching the yelp. And then i felt that yelp's review is right! I had experienced the most delicious beef and pork in Las Vegas even though I'm korean. Especially the beef quality was very good and if you choose here, you'll not regret.

Our favorite Korean BBQ restaurant! 
I think we've been here about 10 times in total :) the service is great, every server is so kind :) and the food is fantastic!! We always dine here with a HUGE group and they handle us very well... We can get a little rowdy....

The meat and sauce are so good, very delicious!! Love it  so much!!! I've had meals at many Korean restaurants, but I'd love to say that this is one of the best Korean restaurants I've ever been! Also, the green tea Macaroon is excellent! This restaurant has many different choices, even people who do not have a very big appetite like me can also enjoy! Not an ad but I strongly recommend!!!

Lots of food and of great quality too. Staff was very kind and polite as well as informative. We came in a big group and ordered the meat lover special. They give you all of your food at once so you don't have to keep asking where your stuff is. The sides were especially good compared to other bbq places I've been. Meat was top notch. Overall a great experience! Definitely recommend!
Everything is very good, costumer service is excellent. I'll come here again when I visit vegas again.

Okay yelpers here's my review. We ordered the following:

1. Harami miso
2. Korean prime Kalbi 
3. Prime Kalbi
4. Kobe Ssam (Uni dish)
5. Uni Bibimbap
6. Spicy soft tofu soup
7. Side of white rice 

Total bill came out to $78.52 for 2 of us before tax  so $90ish after 15% tip. 

I would say the food was 3/4 Korean and 1/4 Japanese style bbq. Korean sides are free and unlimited and if u "volunteer" writing a yelp review u get a free dessert  not the reason I am writing one but hey free is free...

Overall value & price I would say 4.5 out of 5 but with the good customer service it bumps to a 5! Would come back here next time I'm in town! :)


2 days later:

I love the uni bibimbap so much I had to come back here again & get it to go for the road home lol. I had some left over from the 1st time here and  it was still delicious cold. The service person on the phone was pleasant  and helpful. He recommended the bulgolgi bibimbop for the hubby! Will keep u posted on how the food tastes in the car

So here we are in Vegas again May 2016 :)

We're about to drive back home but had to stop for my favorite uni bibimbap!! This dish is served in a stone hot pot so the rice has a nice toasty taste with good amount of uni. 

The quality of meat is pretty good for AYCE place but we usually order a la carte so we don't overeat before we get on the road lol. 

We refer all our families and friends who are in town visiting to eat here! ;)

Til next time...
First time having KBBQ and I love this place! I would definitely come back and recommend. Food was delicious and service was fantastic.
It's pretty good. We ordered the combination for 2 people. Not bad. Kimchi is good and the meats are pretty decent.

Came here on a sunday at 12:30.  The staff got our food out quickly.  All the cuts were very good  (especially both prime kalbi dishes) as well as the sides, which you get complimentary when ordering at least two bbq dishes per person.  The precooked dishes and veggies were tasty also.

I do recommend coming as early as possible, as the restaurant gets filled quickly and the staff gets very busy servicing everyone.

Would come again!
The food and workers here are awesome. The gangnam set was very delicious. Overall a great atmosphere to dine in.

Happy hour specials all week!! We came on a Sunday and ordered from the happy hour menu.  Favorites were Bulgogi and Beef toro!  Sides were delicious too!  Clean and great atmosphere! Will definitely be visiting again.
Great Korean BBQ, I'm from New Mexico and we have nothing close to this! Pretty authentic!
The service was really good which made the experience that much more enjoyable!!...the food was a lot and walked away stuffed... Would Def come back again!!
Excellent service. If you're looking for a delicious meal off the strip, Gangnam is a great place to check out.

My buddies and I came here a random Wednesday night where it was dead. They ordered several combos while I had to look elsewhere on the menu since I was a vegetarian. Despite being envious of the sights and smells that came afterwards, I was happy with my order of veggie ramen and bimbimbap.

When the ramen first came, the noodles looked like they came from an instant ramen package. When I taste the salty sour broth though, I was happy and let the noodles continue soaking the broth and focus on my Sapporo. Once the noodles were completely hydrated, it was delicious.

So was my bimbimbap. I didn't notice any tofu and it didn't have an egg either but still flavourful without any obvious protein. Not only was my meal filling. It was cheap. My large ramen noodle bowl was about 6 dollars while my rice bowl was 8. I can't say no to large cheap portions of tasty food.
Services and food are great. It's worth your time and money here. Highly recommend this place.

Came here on Christmas Day and waited for an hour and a half to get seated. The food was ok. The server Sue was bleh!!! No personality and a nightmare attitude.  :( The place was freezing, they kept the air on all the time at a temperature colder than outside in the winter time! Love Korean food but This one has absolutely so much more room to grow! And until then I won't be back nor will I  be recommending this place to anyone either!!!

Came here for my friends birthday and it was the best decision of our Vegas trip. We ordered sake bombs and it was a really fun experience. We ordered the gangnam style and it was soooooooo good. I will definitely come back my next visit to Vegas.
Portion is really good! With a lot of free side dishes. The only thing is the sauce is all kinda too sweet for us.
First time coming and it was very good. The server was very helpful through out the whole meal. Food was delicious. Definitely will be making a few appearances here!

I was pleasantly surprised with Gangnam KBBQ! The spicy pork and bulgogi was tender and delicious! I came during happy hour and they were $3 and $4 each. I gave this place 4 stars, because I wish there was an all you-can-eat option.

So much meat. Absolutely meaty. Would do again. So much meat. Even meatier. Server says this isn't long enough. nom nom meat. This ice cream better be worth it. It does look tasty. Service is getting kind of weak.

A must visit when you're in Vegas. We got the gangnam style platter, their cheese corn and spicy Kim bop. Everything is delicious and the meat and seafood were of the highest quality. The raw oysters didn't have the seafood after taste at all and went down smooth. The appetizers came out quickly and they keep giving you more if you ask for it.

Service was excellent. The staff is attentive and friendly. 

Ambiance is chill. It's like most of the other Korean restaurants I've been to with kpop music in the background and they're willing to turn on sports for you if you request it. Overall a satisfying meal and experience.

The best korean bbq in town hands down. Me and my girlfriend came in got sat down and got fast and excellent service from the staff. The staff was friendly and efficient. The food was excellent and fresh I tell you better than the other places I've been to in vegas. We got the gangnam and the meat were prime cuts and we'll marinated. I tell you come to this place you will enjoy with your significant other or friends and family pretty cool place.
Best meal ive ever had in vegas....if youre looking for great korean bbq, this is the place to be.
kimchi chigae non-standard but very good. seaweed salad, bibimbap, bbq all exceptional.

First time here going off previous yelp reviews. It did not disappoint. Great customer service from sit down to check out. Food was amazing and not overpriced compared to the strip. Can't wait to go back again.

This is quite possibly the best Korean BBQ restaurant I've ever been to! Everything was soo flavorful from the sides to the sauces and the meats! Service was great and prompt. I have zero complaints. Soooo goooooooood
KBB Gangnam style! Went in for happy hour and got the Harami Miso, Prime rib kalbi and bulgogi of course. Everything was good and tender. Will definitely come back.
Bibimbap is the BOMB! It's a must to try it. For desert you should try their mango macaron ice cream. Love this place

Delishasly Bomb!!!! I would go here all the time even the free desert was good :) great service and a guy looks like jay park in here! So don't miss out girls. Enjoy the food!!! I would go here again I would recommend it to everyone. :D

Oppa..  Every time we come here it is an excellent experience.  The cuts are mastered perfect.  I learned to appreciate tongue here, not talking about making out either.  The pork belly  is fatteningly addicting.  Although theres no AYCE we have tried almost every tier of the menu.  Service is quick and pleasant and really makes dining here enjoyable.  As far as Korean bbq goes they all have the same basic ingredients.  The way it is done here makes us keep returning.  Just the way it is served and the intricacy of the cuts pertaining to the grain of the meat.  Also the Japanese fusion appetizers are good as well.  Sometimes in life you learn quality over quantity.

Food was delicious. Fuhhhhhh
They were really busy but they tried their best for better customer service

This place is the bomb dot com. Really suggests the original bimbimbap and the ramen . We also got one of each meat and everything was awesome. Great service as well even tho our family was one of 14 and were super annoying.

This Korean spot is average. Their banchan is okay. Only liked half of them. Other half was bland. This place is cheap for what they give you. The meats are really good. We got the Gangnam set and you are able to substitute dishes that you don't want so that's a plus. For the amount of food we got, $65 isn't much. If we ordered them al carte, then it probably would've been even cheaper but we were really lazy and hungry. 

The service was attentive. 5/5

The reason why I'm deducting a star is because the seats is far from the table making it uncomfortable while eating. Also it's super hot! Been to maybe Korean bbq spots were it was cool and refreshing to eat. Also maybe the music. I like the music but not what you really want to listen to while eating.

Probably won't come back. Nice spot to get full though.

Donkey was our server. He was very attentive and friendly. The food is always awesome. Every time I'm here in Vegas I always stop in for KBBQ here. The bacon wrapped enoki is so simple but delicious. All the marinated meats are packed with flavor. Bonus points for the jams playing in the background. Don't miss out on this gem!

This is our first time here and the we were very satisfied with the food and service. We ordered the gangnam set for 2 and the meat quality was really excellent.  It was definitely plenty of food and we will be back when in Vegas again.
This is our 2nd time here. The first time was great. We love the appetizer. The meat was really tender. My son love the steam egg. I like the dynamite shrimp.

Wow, these people need to get their butts to the east coast because MAN WILL I MISS THIS.

For Asian BBQ, yes, it looks daunting and overpriced when you first look at the menu. 4oz for 7$ is like paying 7$ for nothing. But when you order the combos for 2 people, you're actually getting enough for 3 or 4. Get one of those and a la carte the few selections you really enjoyed and you're bill will be about 100$ total for 6 people! Not bad, right?  When they ask what kind of rice you want - normal or bulgogi mixed - definitely get the bulgogi. That stuff was the bombbbbbbbbbbbbb. Perfectly sweet to go along with the savory meat!

Awesome authetic Korean food with great price! Definitely coming back again.

Side dishes were a portion. 

I like how bbq has no minimum order given its so cheap per order.

First time here and I can see why there are so many reviews! The service was great and the quality of the meat were really good. Got the premium combo which included the kobe beef. Ambiance was good. Parking can be difficult though, but overall a great experience and I would definitely come again
Coooool place! Near school and greatly recommend!!!!!! Order a premium combo and some extra things during the happy hour. The happy hour is between 3 to 6 pm and after 10pm. Will come back.
Awesome bbq. Very good spicy pork is the best. The service is great. The spicy chicken is very good too. Five stars

While in Vegas for a conference I checked Yelp to find something delicious in the neighborhood and ended up here.

We came during happy hour and tried a variety of meats and appetizers.  Most of them were excellent with the harami miso being my favorite.  The happy hour prices were great.

I had never been an Asian BBQ before and it was a fun experience.  The racist in me noticed the place was filled mostly with what looked like Asian people so that was a good sign.

Food was decent. A lot of meat. Grill burned very fast. I wish they change grill more often. 

I reccomend the gangnam combo.
The food was amazing! Really nice lunch special that will leave you full! Easy parking and great prices. Also a very large desert menu.

The beef pieces are around twice as thick as normal korean bbq restaurants.  So in other words you get a lot for your money here.

The nonmarinated korean prime beef was my favorite as well as the pork belly.  Write a review and get a free dessert here.  Prices are in line with other kbbq.

Just ate here after searched reviews in Yelp. Ordered the Gangnan grill combo, best Korean BBQ we ever had. We also order some noodles, pretty good too.
The service is excellent too. Highly recommended.
First time at this place at Vegas . Food are nice great services at this place. Will be back to this restaurant again

4th time coming here and i gotta say 
their food is pretty much on point on every dishes that i have ordered here so far. 
just ordered kalbi soup and cant wait till i try'em
come check it out  for ur self whenever u visit vegas!

I actually did not understand why it has so many 5 star ratings..It is just ok..Not that perfect. The food is delicious as well as the sources they provided. However, comparing to Japanese style BBQ, the meats were not that fresh.

Amazing local place near the Chaotic Vegas Strip. Lots of locals come here! We had the $120 preset Gangnam menu and couldnt finish it between the 4 of us.  Highly recommend it for a fun experience and quality of food.

Great Korean food, great experience with a group, lots of meets and very filling. Bulgogi was delicious and the servers were very attentive. The special is a good deal esp for Vegas. Oysters were aiiiiiite, but other than that everything was #DANK
Fantastic Korean BBQ... I had the beef short ribs and spicy chicken.  Everything that others in our party ordered was equally delicious.

I'm pregnant and I have been craving Korean bbq for the last month. This place really satisfied my craving for it. It was absolutely delicious! I will definitely come back here again. They have excellent service. All our food was hot and fresh .

This has been most peasant experience at GangNam. If you have large party you better come (more than 2ppl) here not only this place is very good price but also it will fill all of your people. Food is great and amazing.
We tried meat lover and all of them are great. Side dishes are also very good. We will definitely come back for next Las vegas trip.
Nice atmosphere and great food. The service was great and the food came out pretty fast. It was pretty busy for a Wednesday so probably you should make reservation on the weekend.

Booked a reservation through Open Table, and found out they didn't accept any reservations after 8pm. However, they were so accommodating and still sat us within the time frame.

We ordered the premium for 4 and the food was delicious!! A must try when youre in Vegas. 

The customer service was on point from the beginning to end. Definitely will recommend this place to anybody visiting Vegas.

From beginning to end this place was great! The food and service both did not disappoint. We came right before lunch time so thankfully no wait (by the time we left there were lots of people waiting). Ordered the premium combo and nengmyun (korean noodles). Each meat was delicious but my favorite was the kobe style beef. It melts in your mouth! Topped off with free macaron ice cream through yelp check in, it was the perfect meal.

First time here and first time ever being at a place where you can cook your own food at your table. So many different options. This place is definitely the new place. It's great for a group of friends or even a date. Try it. Srsly.

Very good cook at the table Korean BBQ. Meats were very flavorful and generous portions. Busy place so make a reservation. Service was nice but it does get busy at times. They were also very good about switching out the cooking grill so you always get a fresh one and not keep using a burnt one.

Lunch special is an amazing price for the quality and quantity of food. bbqing the food was super entertaining. The Harami miso and spicy pork were tender, delicious, and marinated to perfection. Very friendly staff. Would definitely recommend!

Great service and food. They were nice enough to cook up my barbecue as I multi-tasked with studying for an exam. Everything I ordered was wonderful. The scallops wrapped with bacon, the Kobe sliced beef and the fried pot-stickers and brown rice option were the best. I flavor was great and so was the atmosphere.  I plan to return.
Great food and amazing service.  The staff is very friendly we will be coming back the next time we visit Vegas!

If you're in Vegas and you're looking for KBBQ, you ABSOLUTELY MUST come eat here! This is the best KBBQ I've ever eaten. Literally everything was really, really good. 

We ordered the Gangnam to split between 4, and subbed the miso soup for the kimchi chigae for no extra charge. It was enough food to provide us another meal. I really appreciated that the meats were fresh, had their own flavor, and were not overly salty. Food highlights/must haves: kimchi and bibimbap. 

Staff here are super nice and accommodating!
We came here immediately after landing at the airport. The food was phenomenal. I'd highly recommend the chicken karaage, seafood pancake, and chigae. All were so flavorful and delicious!
Great service and excellent food.  The menu was well prepared.  Awesome selection.  Nice ambiance.  Love the music. I highly recommend this restaurant.
Researched this place before heading out here from SoCal & I was anything  but disappointed! Will be adding this to our "must have" list of places to eat while on our yearly Monster Jam trip

I've been craving Korean BBQ since I got to the States and this is the first one I found. Their happy hour is awesome, meat is cheaper and alcoholic drinks are all 50% off! Even without the happy hour, they have killer lunch specials and everything is really affordable - much more than other Korean BBQs in the country!
This is such a cool place, it has a grill at each table. The happy hour prices are reasonable and well worth it. Service was amazing and we come here every time we come to Vegas!!
We came here from yelp review and absolutely love the foods! This is one of the best Korean food we ever had!
Fantastic service and the food is the best Korean BBQ around! Kids and adults loved the pork and beef.  The spicy Ramen was also the bomb!

Very good, saw on Yelp and it didn't disappoint!  Got the combo dinner with husband.  The meat was very tender and flavorful.  The wait staff is a bit Juliet or miss, but we came just after the lunch rush.  They were very friendly.
Very delicious. Great guality, really enjoyed the experience. The gentlemen server was very patient and nice. Would definitely come back.
The tuna salad is really good, even the salmon  carpaccio, but the lava cake dessert is awesome

We had a craving for Korean BBQ and was very happy with our dishes... Keep in mind it's for two people...we killed our food! We ordered bacon scallops, pork belly, garlic beef, spicy pork, tofu soup. Awesome find in Vegas!
Super delicious. Like the service food is excellent. I recommend this place. 5 stars for this restaurant.
Everything I tasted was perfect: the miso soup, seaweed salad, Bulgogi, Spicy Pork, Filet, Fondue, etc. etc. etc. One of the best meals I've ever eaten.
Just a short drive from the Strip. We ordered a variety of meat dishes. We recommend the beef toro, the bacon wrapped salmon, and the beef kalbi soup. Come with friends and a big appetite!
